Title: Usual syandard
Review: Have eaten in many restaurants around the world and found this restaurant matched standard and service. The waitress was very attentive and the food was of decent standard. If I was in the area I would revisit.

Title: Worth a trip
Review: Thought the service was very good, food was great, didn't have to wait long for our food, was always asked if they could get us anything, worth the money
We found the hard rock café and decided to go and have breakfast. Food was not the best, but a good place to go and look a the memorabilia and have a drink.

Title: Hard rock review
Review: Food was good, atmosphere was good. Not too long a wait ( it was superbowl Sunday though and they were not showing the game ) For the money, the food was good, service too was good. Would recommend for a bite to eat.

Title: Always a Rocking Time!
Review: As all the Hard Rock Cafe restaurants the experience is great, the service was top quality with the servers knowledge of the menu outstanding. Always hard not to purchase something from the shop on the way out....

Title: The food was great.
Review: Nice place if you are a music or rock lover, even if you only are a food lover. I tasted a New York and it was great.

Title: Great place
Review: It is very cosy restaurant. Good music is playing there at any time. A lot of beautiful photos! Meals are hearty!

Title: Times Square, Same old american stuff
Review: All food edible, but its all a little boring. BBQ this, crumbed that. OK if you like this stuff. Very dark in there.

Title: The best rock cafe
Review: Rock cafe is the best one of the world,is beautifful an shinning and have the best drinks in my life

Title: Fab meal
Review: Went to celebrate a 50th, and the staff sang to her. No band on but a lively venue in Times Square. Fabulous evening.

Title: Group/party of 60
Review: Fun atmosphere and entertainment with great memorabilia on display. Average food with average service. My first visit to a Hard Rock Cafe .... wouldn't rush back.

Title: Eh
Review: I had never been here before and honestly expected a bit more. Was perfectly fine, but I agree with other sentiments on here about needing to be updated and the place being worn.

Title: Good food great atmosphere
Review: My daughter really likes had rock so we always go to one when visiting big cities. Food is consistently good and great for vegetarians.

Title: Good food friendly staff
Review: Ate here twice ribs are yummy had pulled pork had Cpl cocktails you get to keep the glass not as much to see inside Florida 1 has more staff fab

Title: Same all over the world.
Review: Good choice of cold beer, reasonable Hard Rock menu. Was very cold and the service was ok but not outstanding. It is a Hard Rock Cafe and they are all the same everywhere you go. Although this one had some exquisite memorabilia.

Title: Fun restaurant
Review: Took pre-teen and teenage kids and they loved it. Food was good. I liked the Captain Crunch Chicken.

Title: Delicious
Review: Not to expensive, the food is very good and Kids loved the place and the musics. The People Who works there were very Nice.

Title: Good food good music
Review: The food drink & service were great the surroundings were awesome the music was as on the label ROCK ,after the meal we bought a gift from the shop here the service was average at best

Title: Cool
Review: Loved it - massive place and loaded with rock memorabilia. Food nice and massive dishes to boot. Worth a visit.

Title: Just ok
Review: The waiter was excellent, the food was so so, and overpriced. But the memorabilia was great, the music videos were just as great.

Title: Great Breakfast!!!!!
Review: Stopped by on our way back to Penn Station and decided to try the breakfast offerings. The breakfast was delicious and plenty of food. Three eggs, potatoes and crispy bacon!!!! Service was excellent and food arrived very quickly and hot!!!! Great meal!!!!

Title: Super Rush on weekends
Review: You have to wait in long queue for getting a seat. Don't think it is worth the wait. Or else you have to sit in bar counter which is not appealing.

Title: Normal food
Review: Has your basic foods found in all restaurants. Ordered the steak fajitas and they came out dry order was wrong the server offered to fix it however, I didn't have time to wait. Beer selection is limited.

Title: Good Food
Review: The food here was good. The service was quick and friendly. A great atmosphere and decorations all around where good too! We enjoyed the cocktails and came away with a Hard Rock Cafe New York glass to take home!

Title: Not a culinary experience, but great service!
Review: Not the greatest culinary experience, but fun to have visited. You know what you get, but food tasted good and the service was great! Good atmosphere :)

Title: Fun place and great for a snack
Review: Visited Hard Rock Cafe on a Saturday afternoon for a snack and cocktail. The nachos were huge and very tasty. Cocktails were very strong and the service was great.

Title: fun place with gluten free menu!
Review: This is a fun place. They have a good selection for gluten free food. prices are typical nyc but food is worth it except the gluten free bun was hard. Service could be a bit better though.

Title: HRC New York
Review: Very helpful and friendly staff. Sat pretty much straight away and our waiter recommended their local legendary 'pizza burger' which didn't disappoint!

Title: Hip place in nyc
Review: My daughter and I went for dinner here. I got a huge salad with chicken and all sorts of good toppings. My daughter got a burger. The server was good and attentive and it seems to be a well run place.

Title: Amazing!
Review: There was a 45 min wait to be seated but it was worth it! The food was lovely.......tasty and hot! The atmosphere was really nice. We all thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.

Title: Always fantastic
Review: Although we had to wait an hour for a table it was worth it, the food was great and our waiter Hakeem was very entertaining

Title: Fantastic Place
Review: This was our 6th time visiting Hard Rock NYC and loved every minute of it. The food is great, staff are brilliant and the music is tremendous. Highly recommended.

Title: Slow service
Review: Had breakfast here, took ages for our orders to be taken despite the restaurant not being busy. The food however was good and the location is great

Title: Bad service
Review: I'm drinking a moskow mule at the bar right now. Very bad service. The drink is on the average of nothing. No tip for the guy. He doesn't even say hello to us.

Title: Very cool place to visit
Review: This is like a mini music museum. We had a good dinner but found it to be a bit pricey for what you get. Otherwise our service was great and we just had fun looking at all of the memorabilia.

Title: Celebrating my sons 18th bday today 1st Jan
Review: They told us a wait for 1.30 mins, we decided to wait, only waited 45mins, the meal was lovely, best meal I've had all holiday, felt very sorry for waitress she had started at 10.30 am til 1.00pm crazy. Great place, reasonable

Title: Ok....
Review: Nothing spectacular! Service was rather slow and when ordering the large pulled chicken burger. Came on a tiny plate and was cold. Not really impressed for the price. Such as shame as was really looking forward to going here!

Title: Great Ambience
Review: Rocking ambience. The food wasn't the huge portions that I expected it to be. They were small and average tasting burgers. Although the chocolate molten cake was scrumptious & it simply melts in your mouth!

Title: Good atmosphere and service
Review: Although the restaurant was busy we were seated promptly (they told us 1/2 hr but buzzed in 5 minutes). Good food, large portions, I was full with a starter, good service and overall a great restaurant.

Title: Christmas Dal lunch with a difference!
Review: Having ensured we booked to turn up with a table all ready was perfect. Music loud, lights a little dim but great atmosphere and very attentive staff. Really worth a visit.

Title: Hard Rock cafe
Review: I went years ago in 1995 with Mrs. Gordon Travel and tourism class .It was great then . And fast forward to 2016 it's still great . Friendly wait staff. Good prices. Atmosphere great too. Must go and see for your self

Title: Love this place
Review: Our "table friend" was Jonathan who made our night just perfect. He went out of his way to attend to our needs and nothing was too much. The food was lovely, atmosphere spot on and service amazing. Would most definitely recommend.

Title: Good
Review: I'm not a lover of Hard Rock but i found that place so full of music history, as should be every Hard Rock! I have drank only a beer so i can't judge food but i liked service, it was very kind and funny!

Title: Always a good time!
Review: We dipped in here on a cold Friday night because the waiting area is inside. Awesome memorabilia everywhere. We were seated on about 35 minutes, great service and food was good. I would have rated 5 but our appetizer was lukewarm. Cool experience

Title: Great atmosphere
Review: This was one of our first eats on our first trip to NYC. Staff were friendly and food was fairly quick to come out. Ate Mozzarella Sticks and Chicken Strips, washed down with a few beers! Establishment was clean, no complaints from us.

Title: Great
Review: The atmosphere was great spent time looking at the exhibits on show. The food was brilliant and the cocktails were to die for!!!!!! We went there twice for our evening meals and once for breakfast in our weeks stay in New York.

Title: Lunch with tourist friends
Review: The food is average. You go more for the atmosphere and the name. The burgers and fries are good. It's a tourist thong to do.

Title: Deception
Review: We visited because of the fame and the decoration is really nice, but the food, you have multiple better options around. The price, was disprportionated. We won't repeat.

Title: good atmosphere but bit of a wait for tables
Review: Food and service were good, prices a bit high, but we knew that going in. loved to see the memorabilia.

Title: Can't not do Hard Rock!
Review: Just go there...it might be a wait for the table but just go. Food is great, atmosphere is superb and as a Hard Rock experience can't be faulted!

Title: Great way to finish a perfect stay with the last night meal at the hard rock
Review: Great food the staff were so help full food was. So good the soda was refilled as you eat just part of the service Food tasted so good with a great back ground it made the last night so good

Title: Nice place
Review: We came inn a little bit late before closing time. But they fixed good food inn noen time. Nice people, good food, clean place and clean restroom.

Title: very good music (of course) nice staff, bu slow service, average food
Review: every "hard rock cafe" is an experience, this one is it too. The waiters and waitresses are very kind and "cool", but the service takes a long time. The food was average but OK. Pretty expensive for what you get.

Title: Not the best Hard Rock Cafe that I have visited
Review: Visited this restaurant on my recent trip to New York found the food very average had the hard rock burger and fries which had little taste will probably not return here again

Title: December 7, 2016
Review: Ate here for lunch today. Wasn't very busy but the service was just mediocre. Very few visits from our waitress. Food was ok.

Title: Stick to the gift shop
Review: If you want to wait for a while then pay too much for a mediocre burger in really cool looking very crowded surroundings then this is the spot for you. Otherwise focus on the gift shop, buy a Hard Rock pin then head for McDonalds.

Title: Had to visit
Review: It's a little old and odd inside with low ceilings, a true basement bar. Service with bartender Pandora was great.

Title: Birthday 21st
Review: Great atmosphere, buzzing with people, great location good food but pricey. Don't get starters as we did nachos were massive, couldn't eat all mains.

Title: Good version of this restaurant
Review: Had a good all around experience at this restaurant. The service was good. The staff was fast, friendly and willing to help. The food was very good and delivered fast.

Title: Tourist haven
Review: The Hard Rock in midtown is very cool and has great memorabilia. The food and drink are typical of all Hard Rocks and was ok...nothing special there. New York pricing though! Fun. Would recommend for the box to be checked.

Title: Poor servixe
Review: Group of 6, bad service, bad food!!!! Burger was dry, and took ages for drinks to come!!! No flavour in any food

Title: Great experience
Review: First time in NYC and came here twice, beer was good, wings were good (took a while to come) but Michelle was an awesome server which is why I came back. Definitely worth a visit when in Times Square

Title: Awesome. Big portions
Review: Good atmosphere and the staff were all very welcoming and fun. We had a starter and main and wow the starters are huge! The cocktails are great and the cup is a brilliant merchandise to keep.

Title: Cool Place with good American Food.
Review: Went here for lunch and had a great burger and shake. They have some cool stuff in this location and it is not uncommon to see rockers there having a bite.

Title: Prompt but cold
Review: We hadnt booked and was seated within 10mins. Food was of a good standard as always. Only complaints.... lower 'deck' was cold and finished plates were taken away before everyone was finished. Maybe this is English politeness to wait until everyone has finished.

Title: Good food and friendly staff
Review: As any Hard Rock Cafe around the world, it has a great atmosphere and friendly staff. It will be a good choice if you're looking for late dinner since they close @ 1:00 am

Title: Gotta see it
Review: I have been to Hard Rocks in several countries around the world- This has to be the kickinest Hard Rock of all- Great vibes-good drinks- great food as always and love the New York crowds!!

Title: Slow bar service
Review: We stopped for a drink. Took forever to get service, even though the bar wasn't crowded. We only ordered drinks, so the waitress wasn't attentive. 2 cokes & 1 tequila was $23. Very large place.

Title: Great eats!
Review: Great food - lots of choices and great service. Be prepared to wait - very popular spot. Use the time to take pics with memorabilia or see Times Square.

Title: Great food
Review: Had a great meal with my mum, the food was delicious and cocktails where fab other that one that was real salty 😩

Title: Great atmosphere
Review: Great place to have a drink in Times Square Good music great people Bar staff buzzing !! Ok for drinks and food and great service

Title: Hard Rock Time Square
Review: Great collection of rock memorabilia. Good food. Ok beer craft beer selection. Fun for every rock fan.

Title: Great stop for cocktails and appetizers
Review: We arrived in the City with time to spare and decided to stop for a quick drink and appetizer. The waitstaff were very friendly and the Jumbo Combo "starter" was tasty and perfect for two. The Southern Rock cocktail was excellent and is highly recommended!

Title: Nice store crappy food.
Review: Terrible food. Chicken was rubber. The nachos were soggy. One of our friends had to send the plate back. They did take off the cost of the meal.

Title: You know what to expect
Review: You know what to expect, since it's the Hard Rock Cafe, but it was as really a great experience. Loved my juicy legendary local burger and the Long Island ice tea was a new discovery. Had fun, a great time and great food.

Title: Great Atmosphere
Review: We just dropped in for a beer - which cost us $20 for 2. We did however take in the atmosphere and all the guitars displayed were amazing. We also bought a tee-shirt for our nephew in the shop on our way out!

Title: Great Lunch
Review: We had an early lunch : We were seated straight away and the service was quick and friendly. Food was good, burgers, fajitas, pasta, chicken but done well : We enjoyed it very much

Title: Yummy
Review: Another great success at The Hard Rock Cafe. Right on Times Square, reasonable prices. Would recommend a visit when paying New York a visit.

Title: Excellent and what you come to expect
Review: Excellent food and experience. The service was outstanding and very quick. A great place to visit and the usual merchandise.

Title: 50th birthday holiday
Review: Great place in enjoy a burger and atmosphere, the cocktails are pretty good too and you get to keep the glass (at a charge)

Title: Times square
Review: Easy to get to. Very big so lots of tables. Excellent salads. Excellent food. Excellent service. Lots of merchandise. Unfortunately not all the merchandise says New York on.

Title: Worst place in NYc
Review: Took 30 mins to take first order. Got secon round of drinks wrong after being chased to serve us again The guy (John) was beyond useless Error after error!!!! Worst visit ever. Usually great. Ruined the night.

Title: Great atmosphere
Review: Fantastic atmosphere the heart of Times Square..... buzzing place & great staff.....comprehensive cocktail lists, wine is a bit pricey, huge food portions. Feels like a must when in Times Square.

Title: Standard HRC
Review: I love visiting different HRC's, even though they are pretty much all the same. Great cocktails, service quite pushy eg. to get a bigger cocktail with the glass. Then another cocktail (which we declined).

Title: Breakfast
Review: Went for breakfast for my wifes birthday Food was pretty good. Lots of memorabilia on the walls to veiw .. Not sure what I expected but what I did get was averae. You should pre book..

Title: Reunion with former friends
Review: Hard Rock Cafe was not the good choice for our dinner. It was full of people so it was a bit noisy and hurried. The food was good. The place is great

Title: HRC
Review: HRC is on top of my "to do list" when traveling to any country. NY made it so special to me, in the center of Times Square, you will not miss this one

Title: Great food and service!
Review: Music, food, atmosphere and waiters were good. Really recommend this place for other people who love music and good food.

Title: Another one for the collection
Review: This is a huge HRC, full of really interestin stuff. Food wise, you know what you're going to get & it's fine, so you mark the atmosphere, memorabillia & service & here it was very good.

Title: Surprise! Far better than I thought it would be
Review: Had a hamburger in New York on Broadway with my granddaughter. It was a decent burger. I was surprised. So my thought for people who have kids and grandkids who want to go here, don't fight it. It will be okay.

Title: Great for nostalgia
Review: Great to look around at that various music nostalgia at the cafe. Food was massive, fresh however nothing out of the ordinary. Expect to pay more for the privilege of eating in time square.

Title: no line
Review: Good food, good service, no line. The atmosphere was conductive to conversation with out shouting. We will go to another one any time.

Title: Food was good
Review: It was a busy night at the Hard Rock, but it was close as we were just at a Broadway show. Overall, we did not wait long considering how busy it was. Orders were taken quick, food was good!

Title: Great place to eat
Review: Cocktails were delicious. Even got our own cocktail glasses to go. Really busy but did t have to wait long for a seat . Food was lovely and so much going on.

Title: Nice Food and drinks
Review: Sent to eat at Hard Rock Cafe with kids and friends. Large portions - nice taste - friendly staff. Prices in the high range for a burger meal.

Title: Good food and cool waiters
Review: We had dinner here multiple times. The drinks are.. AMAZING. The food is good, especially the burgers. The staff was very friendly too.

Title: Great memorabilia, average food.
Review: We went as a family of six for breakfast and the food was average(just about warm) and hardly anyone else in the restaurant. Good memorabilia. Overall, not as good as other Hard Rock cafes I've visited.

Title: Most Awesome Hard Rock Cafe!
Review: Perfect location right across from theaters, super friendly staff, high energy and the food was quite tasty. Great spot to people watch and a lot of visual stimulation.

Title: Great service
Review: Went to the Hard Rock in times Square for a family dinner whilst on holidays. We were quickly seated. Provided great service and delicious food. What a great place for dinner with a fantastic atmosphere.

Title: Great food
Review: My daughter and I ate here on our first New York evening and it was brilliant. The staff were very friendly, the atmosphere vibrant and the food tasty and plentiful. It is definitely a family focussed restaurant and very good value.

Title: Don't bother
Review: Bad food and bad service... the fajitas was cold, served in a very sloppy way. The worst was that the burger ordered from the glutenfree menu came with a regular onionring full of gluten. How is this even possible?

Title: Horrible
Review: Food was ok. Ran out of steak on a Sunday. Really. Seater was a horrible, person. Major attitude. Made faces behind customers back and when busted made just laughed. Not funny or professional. Management didn't care. Will never go in another hard rock ANYWHERE

Title: Great food, great atmosphere
Review: The choice of beers and cocktails is enormous. The food is fast, tasty and huge portions! There's lots to see while you're waiting on your food - from Rock memorabilia to photos, artwork and even a fantastic display of guitars built into the wall end-on.

Title: Great foid
Review: Very popular restaurant given its location. Great burger and staff were also great at looking after us. Would definitely recommend.

Title: Ladydireigs
Review: The service was slow. Food was ok but not for the price for just the two of us. Very loud. Wouldn't go again.

Title: Rude staff member
Review: Good food,waitress very rude because we did not want her to take our credit card out of sight when paying bill.

Title: Typical hard rock experience, not great but not bad
Review: Everything you'd expect from a hard rock- drinks over priced, meals large but tasty. Friendly service.

Title: Great variety
Review: Many choices to pick from. Food was average, its not a 5 star place. Good burgers and fries. Can't say the same with the service, it took us almost an hour to eat.

Title: Nice location
Review: Really nice Hard Rock location. A bit overpriced as expected in New York. Right in the middle of everything. Paid almost $20 for a pepperjack cheese burger (with bacon). In fairness, it was a very good burger

Title: Wonderful place.. full of music legends
Review: The place is clearly full of music legends. The restaurant is not cheap but the food is ok. We tryied the pig ribs with barbecue sause, simply fantastic!

Title: So so
Review: Booked before we came to Usa. A bit disappointed with the set menu. Not much choice.. did not eat anything. Staff tho were very good. Got a free cocktail.

Title: Pre-concert drinks
Review: Great atmosphere for drinks before concert. Bartender was awesome, drinks were great! Gift shop was fun too.

Title: Good atmosphere
Review: Just went for drinks but a great atmosphere and great music and got to keep our hard rock glasses at the end!

Title: review of Hard Rock New York
Review: My food was superb and the staff was very friendly. The bartenders that served me Chanta and Brittany were fantastic.

Title: NY NY and rock
Review: well is dificult to see hard rock and not to be in, and here we go passing by and having some chiken wings and beer what else you can ask. as all arround the world this place is hily recomended.

Title: Standard hard rock
Review: Same as every other hard rock. Good food, good drinks and loads of memorabilia. Service was good and not a long wait for the food.

Title: Good place, fun!
Review: Had dinner with my sister, good customer service, good food and music. Excelent location. Had a picture with guitars at the entrance, much fun!

Title: Down in the Basement
Review: Noisy lunch at 2pm-ish. Friends wanted to go, not so much me. I have been to several Hard Rock Cafes. Standard chain food but a tad more expensive in NYC. Got to love those taxes!

Title: Vacation
Review: Fast prompt service with great food and great drinks! Oh yeah' and there's a ton of memorabilia! What?... Awesome!

Title: Great food, drinks and service
Review: Great service all the way, pepperoni flatbread was delish as was the milkshakes and cocktail. Fun activity book for the kids too.

Title: 1 meal during September 2016 NYC visit
Review: Although this restaurant is part of a chain the food is very good and surroundings very interesting and full of atmosphere. They have a good selection of both food and drinks and prices are reasonable. The staff were very attentive and helpful during our visit.

Title: Fun For Young Adults
Review: This eatery was fun and the price was right, the only problem it was a long wait for the food, even though it didn't seem that busy, but it was good value for money when it did arrive.

Title: HRC NY
Review: We had a good visit at the HRC. Had good food and drinks and the service lived up to our expectations.

Title: Buy your glass
Review: Expensive glass but can buy a drink and buy a glass as a memory of your visit ..food not to bad but gets busy later in the evening so if eating go earlier

Title: Awesome restaurant at Time Square near Broadway shows
Review: I enjoyed my dinner at Hard Rock Cafe, the food was very good and the service beyond expectation. The decorations are very nice too!

Title: Great!
Review: Great fast and expert assistance from Mercedes our waitress on Saturday night! She was very cheerful and friendly. Great prices and the memorabilia is fabulous especially when you come from England and see all of the icons there. Good music too!

Title: Great atmosphere
Review: Visited around 6pm and the place was full and the atmosphere was great. There was the usual photo opportunity and the cocktail with 'free' hurricane glass. Meal was very nice and the waitress was friendly. Well worth a visit

Title: Ok
Review: Only had a drink in here. Because it was absolutely freezing inside could not sit and have a meal without my coat on. To many lovely places to eat.

Title: Amazing Hard Rock
Review: This Hard Rock is pretty big, the store has a vast selection of items, the restaurant is the trademark Hard Rock restaurant, great burgers as usual and free refills. If you want to eat here you should book your table at least the day before.

Title: Not the best!!
Review: Stopped here for lunch. Not very busy but slow service. My wife had chicken fajitas which were okay but not hot sizzling and appealing. We finished our meal and left disappointed. Probably our most expensive meal of our trip and among the worst.

Title: Loved it
Review: The place has a special atmosphere. Lots of lovely things on the wall. Staff lovely. Good n cocktails great and reasonably priced

Title: Saturday Dinner
Review: A very busy venue, but food and service normal HRC stuff, not cheap but four mains and dessert all eaten and enjoyed. Booked on the app really easily and walked straight in. ( why would you not book in this city)

Title: Hard Rock Dinner
Review: Largest Hard Rock I have ever been in. The waitress was very friendly and we got sat quickly considering how packed it was inside. Food was good. Shop was clean.

Title: Fantastic
Review: Excellent food friendly staff great place to visit plenty to see lots of memorabilia ! The store had so much to buy!

Title: Family holiday to NYC
Review: Probably out best meal out experience as a family dinner. No queue, great staff, food yummy (ribs, fajitas), great atmosphere and photo opportunities. Loved the shop too. Kids had a ball and much laughter and discussion.

Title: If your patience is higher
Review: Getting there and getting the first drink was as hard as digging gold! Bad service, food reasonable, baut people in bad will to work doesn't make sense.

Title: Hard Pop cafe
Review: My chicken was bloody in the middle, Pop music blasting out, AC far too high place was uncomfortably cold

Title: Good food rock location
Review: In the heart of Times square a very rock location where eating was good and the service very kind. Nice tipi al shop outsider the restourant.

Title: First night reservation
Review: We had a great meal and excellent attentive service. In fact nothing was too much hassle for anyone. Us Brits could learn a lot from American customer service.

Title: Typical HRC, well located
Review: Good HRC, big rooms, nice and efficient staff, bau food such as salads rib's and fajitas for a decent price. If you enjoy HRC's you'll not regret it.

Title: unique
Review: Took my family here at my youngest daughters suggestion. Great choice. WiFi family friendly fast service good food good portions. Plenty of choices for everyone very nice atmosphere. Lots to look at .Will definitely be back

Title: GOOD DRINKS
Review: Troy was my bartender and he is amazing, he made my drinks just right and check up on me every ten minutes .

Title: It's Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Food was good, service was swift, its what you expect when you visit one of the cafes. Always busy but we were seated swiftly.

Title: Same old'
Review: A really amazing Hard Rock cafe, located in Times Square. This one is really packed with rare items from Elvis and the Beatles. The food and the service lives up to the great Rock standards. Just be aware of the 18-20% service fee.

Title: good food and service in an interesting place
Review: rock artifacts, music and videos are fun while food and service is good. It is right in the heart of times sq and a good stop.

Title: Loved it
Review: We were in New York for 1 week and couldn't leave without visiting the Hard Rock Cafe! There were 6 of us. We had to wait around 30 minutes for a table, but it was worth the wait. Lovely food, brilliant service! A must visit!

Title: Must Visit
Review: Great Foodand Fast Service. we all enjoyed a lot.you have to wait as this is most crowded place but service is fast

Title: Was great!
Review: No matter what Hard Rock we go to, we always have great food & fast service. If you don't want to wait for a table, go to their website & request one. It's a faster way to be seated.

Title: Still the best
Review: Hard Rock in Time Square is still one of my favourites the food is great and service fantastic and it is really a good place to soak up the atmosphere from the hustle and bustle in Time Square a must do when visiting New York

Title: Expensive but had a great time!
Review: Food was really good. Emily our waitress was lovely! Very welcoming. Great atmosphere, all in all a very good experience!!

Title: First Visit to Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Staff very helpful and friendly. Music to loud to hold a conversation over dinner. Food very good,staff attentive. A must when visiting New York city!

Title: We Rock!
Review: We were in Hard Rock Cafe in NYC in June 2016. Our Bacon Hamburger platter was delicious, while listening to great music in a cool atmosphere! We even got to meet the manager, who offered us free cheesecake! Way to go!

Title: crowded place
Review: During our visit to New York city we had the opportunity to go to eat something at Hard Rock cafe and was a nice one

Title: Quick bite to eat
Review: Came here with a friend once we first arrived in the city with my friend, food arrived quickly and was tasty, great location and atmosphere. I will make sure I come here again on my next visit to New York

Title: Times square hard rock cafe
Review: Its times square, nothing can go wrong with the alcohol or the music. The service is okay but the food not up to the mark. All i wanted was onion rings, no idea how they could mess that up.

Title: Standard Hard Rock fare
Review: Good food, good service and like all other Hard Rock Cafe's all over the world. Portions good and burgers cooked as ordered, can't fault it

Title: Very good place, great food and service!
Review: I went there with my relatives. It was very cozy, litle bit loudy place, but we had fun. I like appetizers more than the meals. I also remember very good service and decoration of the cafe.

Title: Great food and service
Review: We ate here on our first night in NYC and were not disappointed. Food and service was great and was everything a Hard Rock should be - great atmosphere, great music and full of rock and roll memorabilia. Would recommend eating here to anyone.

Title: Great food, great atmosphere
Review: I was really looking forward to trying a NY burger and it was fab! Really tasty fries and a lot of sauce so will be back here for sure! Great atmosphere!

Title: Ambience Rocks!
Review: The HRC is always a rocking experience! Food was very good, prices reasonable. The best part about this experience was the memorabilia and the bartender's impromptu knives on glasses drum rendition of a great rock and roll song!

Title: Loved the Atmosphere
Review: Wow this place is great .Easily found in Times Square .Happy helpful group of people working at this place .Enjoyed our meal and drinks ,good to see a well know establishment run so well .

Title: Average
Review: Despite the Hard Rock Cafe branding, this restaurant lacked atmosphere and the waitress would have benefitted from a customer service course. Food was good though.

Title: One of the best!
Review: One of the biggest and best of HRCs I have visited around the world. It upholds the HRC reputation of excellent food, a well-supplied shop and walls full of Rock memorabilia! And the location is awesome!

Title: Great Food
Review: Really great food with a special atmosphere. The staff are all very friendly and helpful and the decor and exhibitions are all very interesting. a real must for music lovers.

Title: Rock on
Review: I Try to visit the Hard Rock locations when I travel. always time well spent taking time to observe all of the memorabilia and posted literature. Good food and lot of fun

Title: Amazing clean safe fun place to dine
Review: Food was amazing staff were amazing, we sat at the bar ate at the bar & our steaks were amazing, try the cocktails yum yum & buffalo wings very tasty

Title: Style over substance
Review: As always in the states, great service, but this was really average food sold at over-inflated prices. We guessed this before going, but in New York and felt we had to do it.

Title: Rocking....
Review: As always the food & atmosphere was of an exceptional standard. All the staff were extremely helpful & courteous. Just loved it.....

Title: First day in NY meal
Review: First night in New York we decided to visit the Hard Rock - unlike a lot of the other Hard Rocks this place has ridiculously friendly customer service - food was great

Title: Good quality food, good service....very expensive merchandise!
Review: It is a family tradition to make a pit stop at hard rock cafe, mainly to buy a ticket shirt afterwards. Food very good and service attentive

Title: Expensive, Poor Food, Cold
Review: I've been to so many Hard Rock Cafe's, this is the worst The Food was cold The aircon was so cold we were shivering eating The guy serving was nice enough Best memorabilia is there for me was Elvis outfit and guitar

Title: Hard Rock Cafe
Review: it was delicious and Estaba delicioso where you get all kind of food and good lovers infra is good....

Title: Very good service
Review: The music was great and the food came fast! our waiter was Danielle and she was very attentive and did great, I highly recommend coming here for dinner or lunch, And make sure you make a reservation because that will help you get in faster.

Title: Always a Favorite
Review: Have eaten at many a Hard Rock and it never disappoints. Love the atmosphere of the place and all the memorabilia hanging around. And of course the food is pretty good too.

Title: Not just any chain resturant
Review: The staff and food were both better than expected. Our group had a great time and a nice selection to choose from. Really enjoyed the experience.

Title: Hard Rock Consistent
Review: As with all Hard Rock Cafe's there is a wait for dinner but they were quick. The hostess seating us was not too interested in us, however our server was great. The food is consistently good so you really can't go wrong choosing Hard Rock.

Title: Fun atmosphere
Review: Been here a couple of times when in NYC for the novelty. Really enjoyed it and the staff are always friendly.

Title: Delicious
Review: The waitress was excellent,the food was excellent and the items des played were fantastic to view . Able to take pictures.

Title: great
Review: food, service everything was great..spot on. but what else would you expect from hard rock café... quality

Title: Good breakfast
Review: Ate a buffet breakfast. I have never ate breakfast at a Hard Rock. It was very good and staff was great. Would recommend.

Title: Cold food
Review: The service staff were friendly and attentive staff. For it's cost the food was rather ordinary, the fries were cold and I certainly wouldn't recommend it to my friends.

Title: Gotta love Hard Cafe
Review: Always a good place to be in any city. The Hard Rock on Times Square was as awesome as the others I have been to. Love the Hard Rock and look for themin any city. Gotta get a pin fro the locations.

Title: Awesome vibe
Review: We had the best waiter when we were here which actually turned in to a full battle between singers in our group. So enjoyable.

Title: loved it
Review: We had lunch loved the place first time we had every been!! Both our meals were really good. Service was excellent too. Loved that it was in time square. We purchased the photos they take as you first come in. Awesome keepsake!

Title: Great location
Review: Great place to eat in the middle of New York City. Service great told 30 minutes of table only 15 minute wait.

Title: Nice place to recover energy
Review: Good place to stop and refilled your energy with funny fast foods and and the waiter are very kind. It is no the best but it is ok!!

Title: Average
Review: We went just because of the name but the food and restaurant is very average. I wouldn't rush back, there's definitely better places to see/eat.

Title: Great service
Review: Managed to get a table very quickly despite the queue. The waitress was very polite and even bought me out an ice cream to celebrate my birthday

Title: Our dinner in NYC
Review: Great place for lunch or dinner ! Great artifacts of rock guitars pix & many more ! I had s pulled pork sandwich which was very tasty ! If you like mascoto they have a very good one from Australia !

Title: amazing
Review: Hard Rock in the hear of NYC. great place and great music with great shopping. food quality is as usual great.

Title: Nice place to sit more than to eat
Review: We enjoyed the stay ,,, despite the long queue ,, the place is so "lively" and you feel joy inside ,, staff very friendly ,,, food rates only 4 out 5 ,,, no great variety

Title: A good HRC
Review: This is everything you would expect from one of their flagship locations. Decent food, good service, fun memorabilia, and just generally a good place to refuel while discovering New York!

Title: Hard rock cafe
Review: Popped in for a bite to eat after a hard day shopping in new York. It's exactly what you expect good food and beer and a staggering amout of pop memorabilia , you could spend hours just looking at all , well worth a visit

Title: Great!
Review: Had dinner one night and lunch a few days later both were lovely. Staff were great. Much quieter in the day. Apparently just started doing breakfast not on the website yet.

Title: Dinner at hard rock
Review: This is an enormous restaurant with a large shop at the front. Food was good and drinks were up to hard rocks normal standard.great. Staff were helpful and knew their menu well.

Title: Lunch
Review: What can I say it's a Hard Rock. The food was reasonable and the service was good. The atmosphere well how can it be anything but awesome with all that Rock and Roll memorabilia.

Title: Fun place to eat
Review: This was my kids' first time in a hard rock cafe and it was awesome! They really enjoyed it! Food was fantastic!

Title: Nice burger place
Review: Very busy but we got served very quick. Staff was very efficient and friendly and food was good. Coctails yummy too.

Title: Cheerful staff, delicious food
Review: It's a great place for a short break with a nice decoration inside, you can take many photos. We had special hamburgers, was so tasty and had a chat with the waiter who was so kind to us

Title: Decent Chain Food
Review: Overall a decent experience. Service was a bit slow, but our server appeared to be serving a lot of tables. The food was surprisingly good for a chain, everyone in our party enjoyed their dish. Very fun if you are into music.

Title: Yummy Pork Ribs & Flatbread!
Review: Visited Hard Rock Cafe at Times Square on June 2016. Wonderful experience as the staff there are well-trained, pork ribs (big portion), salad and flatbread were superb and great dining ambience. Highly recommend it to those who likes American food!

Title: Great atmosphere
Review: We arrived and expected to wait but were seated quickly. The service was excellent - attentive and friendly. Food was fab, music was great and the atmosphere was brilliant. A good restaurant close to Times Square.

Title: Good Hard Rock Cafe
Review: In many ways a typical Hard Rock Café - which is a good thing. You know what you are getting. You can always get a good meal and nice drink here - and also buy one or two things from the shop.

Title: a bit tired looking
Review: we like hard rock café and tend to visit them all over the world when on holiday, I felt this one lacked the atmosphere of others we visited, food was fine typical hard rock menu, service was very good, would go back if in area.

Title: Third Visit
Review: We visit the Hard Rock Café every time we're in NYC and we love it! This time we were with a group of 6 friends and the staff were hilarious and very friendly!

Title: Lovely
Review: They said a 40 minute wait within 10 mins we was seated, our waiter was great, served us so quick, the food was lovely and the Oreo cheesecake was AMAZING.

Title: Yummy burger with kids
Review: Had dinner here before the Theatre. The burgers are good, service was good, but the place is a little noisy. Fortunately we brought headphones for the 12 year old so he could listen to IPad and not become overwhelmed by the noise-it was EXTREMELY loud.

Title: Ok food
Review: While site seeing we stope do to them the hardrock cafe, food was ok service was ok not the greatest

Title: Over priced & pushy staff
Review: The food was basic and simple, nothing out of the ordainary. Service was slow and really not worth the wait. Waitress very pushy and really working for her tips. It felt false and intrusive.

Title: Always great food a Hard Rock
Review: First visit to this Hard Rock and loved it. Had to wait about 5 minutes to get seated. Fast efficient service.

Title: Slow service, average food
Review: Loved the restaurant but disappointed with slow service. I ordered fajitas and it was bland. Food was overpriced. My cocktail was way too sweet and little alcohol. Server was friendly but not as attentive in refilling sodas.

Title: Times Square
Review: Right next to the big screens on Times Square. Friendly staff. Food was good. Ate early on a Friday evening so we didn't have to wait. Liked the tv screens showing other hard rock locations.

Title: Busy
Review: Waiters was nice but very business no time for small chat just order and business only. The food was okay it wasn't my favorite but we ate it. Heart of Time square.

Title: Great mid-afternoon visit
Review: Right in the middle of Times Square, you know what your gonna get each time you step in to a Hard Rock Cafe..... Great food, great staff, loud music, fascinating memorabilia and lots of tourists.

Title: NYC Iowa Band
Review: Great food, great service, amazing desserts. Took 3 high school boys and they thought the place was amazing.

Title: Addicted to HRC
Review: This is a really great Hard Rock Cafe, the food was good, not always the norm, the staff in the rock shop was awesome and so very helpful. Loed this place!.

Title: Fun spot
Review: Good food. Interesting spot to eat with my teen daughter. Service was excellent. Would definitely go again even though I tend to steer clear of chains.

Title: Best Cheesecake Ever
Review: When we say that the real cheesecake is made in New-York..no doubt about that! Amazing NewYork cheesecake at Hard Rock, I'm still craving for it. Definitely the best I've eaten so far.

Title: Great Cocktails
Review: I was going to have beer, until I saw the cocktail menu. The Oreo cheesecake was remarkably good too. They seem to have an odd seating system, which may be necessary at peak times but added an odd layer of complexity given it was quiet.

Title: School trip 50 teenagers
Review: Had the chicken Cesar salad and ice tea for a predetermined meal is pretty good. We were given a limited menu because of our large group. Included it is certain of a chocolate chip cookie which was very large and not too bad.

Title: SIMPLY WOW
Review: This place needs no review....if you are tourist , its a must visit .... go there...get a drink or some food...just be around..and you will know want to visit again

Title: Fantastic Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Best Hard Rock I have been too. Great atmosphere, good staff and excellent food. As you can imagine it is massive and has plenty of memorabilia

Title: Always great
Review: I don't think it matters what one you go to they are all great, good service , good food and great atmosphere. This one was under neath the shop in Times Square easy to find.

Title: Excellent vibe
Review: We were 'walk-ins' and seated immediately on a busy Sunday evening. The staff were incredibly welcoming and friendly. The service, food and atmosphere were all outstanding. Definitely going back there when next in NYC!

Title: Great Place for a Meal before or after Theater
Review: Typical Hard Rock Café. Standard burgers. Large portions. Great place for a meal before or after the theater. Centrally located right in Times Square. A bit noisy because it is always busy, but a very reliable choice for a meal in NYC.

Title: Nice food and good service.
Review: Visited early evening and got a table straight away. Great service and food was good quality. Not that expensive to say that it's on Times Square.

Title: Nice experience
Review: Food was great and reasonably priced for NYC. We got to watch a live auction while we ate which I thought was pretty cool. Service was friendly and well mannered. I would definitely go back :)

Title: Great food and atmosphere
Review: We booked a table for Sunday night. Was very busy but good service and good quality food. Great atmosphere

Title: Good for times square
Review: So to be clear, nothing to write home about but a good place to go - not a dinner place but lunch is perfect. The staff know the menu and are very attentive. Price was it is very reasonable for Nyc especially times square

Title: HARD ROCK FOOD
Review: I Had a burger and my wife had steak, the food was really good, the steak cooked to perfection. The service was excellent and the waitress was very friendly.

Title: Hard Rock @ Times Square
Review: Good place to eat and shop. Not too expensive, prices comparable to other major cities. Personnel at restaurant and store friendly.

Title: Made a great first impression on us
Review: This was our first meal in NY with a group of 11- our waitress was very accommodating with multiple checks and split meals. Food was delicious.

Title: Fantastic
Review: Well located and spacious inside. The drinks, service and food are all excellent. Highly recommended.

Title: Time square
Review: Very nice hard rock cafe located on the famous time square. Very crowdy. Very friendly staff although its always full due to the location.

Title: Lunch Break
Review: Our meal was really tasty served up hot and no long wait. Our waitress was helpful, interested and efficient. The atmosphere was great as was cleanliness of the restaurant and the rest rooms.

Title: Meh..
Review: Just okay.. Because we booket AS a group, we got a limited menu with just a few courses to choose from... The food was boring, but the waiters was smiling and serviceminded.

Title: Good Place For Music Junkees
Review: Our group of seventy enjoyed a delicious breakfast here though it is not normally opened for breakfast. I enjoyed looking at the typical Hard Rock decor and setting. Waitstaff were fine.

Title: New York strip steak......delicious
Review: Where better to eat a New York strip steak and listen to good music on your 60th birthday than in the Hard Rock Cafe in Times Square? Great food, great service, but strangely quiet and few people dining.

Title: Good Mac and cheese!
Review: Recommend this place highly - do a great Mac and cheese and the service was very good. Make sure you try the onion rings - they are pretty amazing. Definitely worth a visit.

Title: Only if you are a huge fan
Review: I travel with a friend that collects Hard Rock memorabilia. It is always fun to look at the displays. However, it is priced too high and not worth my $$.

Title: Disappointing
Review: Very disappointing visit to HRC. Food was lukewarm and the same burger cost $4 more than the Philadelphia restaurant. Service was poor, no atmosphere and even the music was mediocre. We always got to HRC on city breaks but we won't be going back.

Title: Tame Hard Rock
Review: The food was typical Hard Rock Cafe style, so enough said. We were disappointed with the music aspect; very low key rock and not much audience participation.

Title: Great Burger!
Review: The hamburger I had was huge. The gift shop, the rock memorabilia and the music made it a cool experience.

Title: Great atmosphere and great food
Review: We spent an enjoyable evening here and enjoyed some great music and an electric atmosphere. Fantastic selection of food and drinks. Staff were great and we had a great evening. Food was reasonably priced too and generous portions.

Title: Very atmospheric, noisy but super staff
Review: We managed to be seated quite quickly for an early dinner. Very helpful waitress who managed to get one of our meals, with underdone steak recooked. Food was hot and tasty and well presented. Would go again when near Times Square.

Title: a must visit
Review: I always visit a Hard Rock store just so I can expand my t shirt collection. Slightly disappointing as not very big and not such a good variety of tshirts avaialble

Title: Maybe too much going on
Review: Sat at the bar. The bartender was pleasant enough but it took a while to get his attention. Decided to split a burger. The burger was well prepared but the fries were soggy. The place is massive but the experience should not be subpar.

Title: Familydinner
Review: This is place to visit and to have a good dinner with friends or family, i can recomend Hard Rocks BBQ baby back ribs, these are so good.

Title: Great Atmosphere and Rock relics
Review: I really enjoyed it. It had great atmosphere and Rock relics. Staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. Food was good, what you would expect from the franchize. They served also breakfast and it is a good deal. 20 USD for a very good breakfast.

Title: rocknroll
Review: ıt was great time for me. first the building is so nice and music, workers, decoration and everthing is okay. you want to spend much money because there are so many things to buy inside. you should visit indeed!

Title: Hard rock reigns supreme
Review: Not much to say about the hard rock, as most have equally fantastic staff and food,if you like your music and beer you have to visit. Food is always high quality and beer always cold. Staff friendly,knowledgeable and chatty.

Title: OK, fun atmosphere
Review: We were in Times Square and needed a break, so we decided to eat here. Service was okay, food was okay but way over priced. Fun atmosphere. My kids loved it: ages 11-14.

Title: Good music, cool ambience and american food
Review: The Hard Rock Cafe is a must go to music lovers, in New York is a great spot to have a meal or drink a cocktail for everyone! Located on Times Square, the restaurant has a great ambience!

Title: Delicious
Review: This is by far one of the best restaurants in Manhattan. The staff is courteous, kind and quick. The food is outstanding and a great place to eat while visiting times square nyc

Title: OK
Review: Went to a show. No room to sit. Too many people in a very small place. Service was good. Food was okay.

Title: Excellent food, fun atmosphere
Review: My husband and I enjoyed the food and the ambiance. We enjoyed a leisurely lunch before the matinee. Service was attentive.

Title: great junk food
Review: If you love music, à special wolrdwide known place, then you have to go thère. The foot is great and thé atmosphère spécial. Only downquote : The music is way to loud and thé service is slow. for thé rest, spécial place to see!

Title: Its always awesome!!!
Review: Hard rock cafe of new York city times square is great... Located at best place of times square, superb music, awesome food... And yeah YMCA is superb!!!

Title: could be better
Review: the place was good but the service was poor they were very slow and clumsy i thik they should be more active

Title: A landmark
Review: A great place to party especially if you are traveling with kids. Good music & good food. Fantastic location - can get very busy and average wait time could be any where between 10 to 30 minutes.

Title: Nice Place to drink or eat something
Review: Hard Rock Restaurant is in many cities in The USA like New York, Hollywood Fl, Miami Fl, Orlando Fl, etc. They offer American Food and some pieces of museum like guitars or famous singer clothes in exposition.

Title: Best burger in town !
Review: We all wanted a burger on our visit and were not disappointed - quick service great place and gratuity optional ! Highly recommended

Title: Great place to eat and drink.
Review: The 7 of us girls went here for dinner and a couple of drinks and great music. It was relaxing and great service. The Food was great and so was the drinks. 2006

Title: slow service/below average food
Review: Service was so slow and the food was only average. and over priced By sharing your experiences, you're helping travelers make better choices and plan their dream trips. Thank you!

Title: Average
Review: Food was good and service was mediocre. Drinks were awful. Probably wouldn't return. There are way too many places better nearby.

Title: Breakfast buffet was average
Review: Not the best food selection or quality, but got us out of the rain, with no queues, in fact nearly empty! But quite good price considering.

Title: Price too high. Food poor
Review: Was there for Lunch. You pay for the name. We had to wait a long time for our food and the atmosphere isn't that good. But it is worth to give a try

Title: Great food and atmosphere
Review: The food and our server was excellent. The memorabilia all throughout the cafe was awesome. Enjoyed the food and the historical items encased all around.

Title: Average overpriced but good location a day service
Review: It's a good place as its conveniently located in times square Broadway area. Over priced as expected with the name but the food was pretty good and as busy as the place was the service was fast and efficient

Title: Tried and Tested
Review: The Hard Rock Cafe are what they are. tried and tested same menu wherever you go, no problems the staff were cheerful and very helpful as always just what you expect

Title: Best Hard Rock Cafe to visit!!
Review: This is the best Hard Rock Café location I've every been to. Large HRC store, museum and PLENTY of seating and atmosphere!! Wait staff, David made our dinning experience enjoyable and he even offered some interesting points about what to see on that particular day.

Title: Typical Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Had dinner here on our last full day in New York, Good service and usual HardRock Cafe food. We had steak. We have had better at their restartants but it was generally edible.

Title: Decent
Review: As ever...Great Experience. Joseph our waiter was very good...always a smile and very chatty to say he was rushed off his feet. Food was as normal...very nice...said our waiting time was 45 mins...we were sat down within 15 mins so all was good.

Title: Not Very Good
Review: To be honest i really disliked this restaurant. They didn't have great food like others and it just wasn't very great food.

Title: Rock in' out at the Hard Rock
Review: The food was good, the service was good and the atmosphere was strictly "Hard Rock". The prices were good for NYC.

Title: Good american food and good ambience
Review: Always full and keeping qualityt os a woth place to eat if you are looking for music and a bit of party. Friendly Service, good food, drinks and music $$$

Title: Tourist trap
Review: This place is big, but don't expect too see many locals here. The title says it all; the chain has outlets in a number of cities. Nothing well prepared or gourmet about the food, but the portions are substantial & that's good for sharing.

Title: Always great to visit
Review: As it says it's a Rock cafe and with buzzing tunes blasting out with video screens and fantastic staff this is a great place eat and drink in New Yorks Times Square.

Title: Reward Visit
Review: It was very busy and the menu doesn't have a lot of options. We spent about 3 hours there. I needed to use up my reward points. Nothing exciting about the visit

Title: Good lunch!
Review: Folk's we decided to stop by and have some burgers and cold beer and this is place is very nice. The staff was very professional and polite and the food and drinks were great. I will stop again on my next trip here to NYC.

Title: The same
Review: When you go to one you have seen them all. Collecting drum sticks is the reason I go. The whole concept is outdated. Time for new things. Predictable in food and entertainment. But ok. Disneyland for musiclovers from the past.

Title: Meal card gave great value
Review: We had prepaid a meal and knoew our cjhoices, our server was very good and the food came quickly and the burgers were really good. You could have free soft drink refills.

Title: Great place
Review: Great food, great staff, great service, book in advance, enjoy the music and the atmosphere. Well worth the visit. My wife had her 40th birthday there and they bent over backwards to give her a great birthday. Huge thanks to them.

Title: Day 3
Review: Loved this place I could have stayed in hear for the rest of the day but daughter wouldn't let me. Lots of memorabilia to look at cocktails and food were good very relaxing

Title: Extra-cool
Review: I always remember it with a smile. Excellent food, good music, greatful atmosphere, waitresses always funny and careful about the clients!

Title: Way Overpriced! Food so so
Review: If you wanna drop $130 for lunch, then this is the place! This place is way overpriced and the food is below average to average. Flip side is, servers are super nice

Title: Busy
Review: Very busy but plenty of memorabilia to look at while your waiting. If you are looking for some where quiet and don't like loud music this is not the place for you.

Title: Portions too small!
Review: The food quality was quite good but the portion size was a bit too small for my liking and they also got my order wrong. The theming was good and it carried through the whole restaurant.

Title: Give it a go
Review: Very busy place get there before 6 pm if u don't want to wait. Big meals not to expensive and drinks reasonable,food good choice and good quality .

Title: Nice dinner. Lively atmosphere.
Review: Nice dinner, lively atmosphere, everything you'd expect from a hard rock cafe, yes it was busy but we never felt rushed, good service and food was well presented. Crushed berry cocktail is recommended is you want a refreshing drink.

Title: What You Expect From Hard Rock
Review: The food at this location is like everything else "New York"... Expensive!! The menu and loud, rock atmosphere is much like what you expect at any Hard Rock Cafe. I try to visit them everywhere we travel, but they are predictable.

Title: Food was predictable, and service wasn't great
Review: Same food as other locations but predictable and good for families. Our server wasn't at all on top of our needs. Mains were served before we were doe with our appetizers. Drinks were gone and we had to ask the manager about getting more.

Title: Horrendous service and attitude at host stand
Review: Terrible experience, went in at midnight, host said closed people dining, asked if open till 1am as advertised and posted, she said they are still closed. Will never go to Hard Rock again.

Title: Its Hard Rock
Review: I Like Hard rock cafe, but must admit new york's restaurant is a bit crowded, with long lines. But it is hard Rock, and its always an excellente place to share with friends and to drink Large margueritas!

Title: Always good Cocktails!
Review: Stopped for a quick lunch and drink. Excellent Nachos as always! Cocktails a little disappointing on this occasion.

Title: Not the best Hard Rock
Review: The waiting staff were really good however the food was pretty average. The ribs didn't have a lot of meat on them. Drinks were pretty good. Couldn't beat the location and decor.

Title: Great!
Review: This is another must do in NYC - such a large venue and a great atmosphere. The food is 'ok'. A bit mass produced and bland but I guess you shouldn't expect everything from this place. Great for families and couples.

Title: First food stop
Review: We enjoyed our meal here. The restaurant was clean and employees professional and courteous. If you have been to a Hard Rock anywhere else then this one is no different. The food was very good. And prepared as we ordered. No complaints. Would go again.

Title: Average food
Review: I am sure this restaurant can serve better meals that I've got. And actually the atmosphere is not bad at all. But my hamburger felt a but synthetic.

Title: A must stop
Review: Very consistent for the quality of the service, food and drink. One of the best HRC for sure. Nicely decorated. Never come to NYC without stopping there for a drink or a meal!

Title: Good standby
Review: Place was busy but service was quick and friendly. Typical chain food restaurant. Cool memorabilia though.

Title: I love HRC!
Review: I love the Hard Rock Cafe! Burgers were great. Service was perfect--very friendly and attentive! Always fun.

Title: Great food !
Review: Quick service,great food,polite and friendly staff. Very dark inside this restaurant which made it just a little depressing, music in here is really loud too so it's not really a place I'd take elderly people to, however the food was very good !

Title: Not worth the money
Review: With a typical Hard Rock Cafe atmosphere, the service is not great and the food doesn't have the expected quality. The hamburger was dry.

Title: it's a must do for Rock fans
Review: when you are in New York and you are a rock fan, you have to visit the Hardrock Cafe. There is always a waiting line, but the food is good and also the drinks. and finally you have to buy the newest Hardrock T-shirts ;-)

Title: A good chain restaurant
Review: Having visited many Hard Rocks this one was not a lot different from the other. Like all the others I have visited the service is good and food very nice. This restaurant is in Times Square so can get very busy.

Title: Good nachos and drinks .
Review: Good Nachos and drinks .Cool atmosphere too . Very busy all the time . Service was not great but not poor either .

Title: Evening meal
Review: Quick service, reasonable priced for location. Cheesecake amazing. Food was good apart from no bbq sauce in my bbq burger?

Title: Good service - as your would expect
Review: We visited as we have many other branches, good food, drink and service and pretty reasonable. A good safe bet for a bite to eat.

Title: Great food / great atmosphere
Review: The restaurant was very busy but after the edit it was worth it . Great music , great food and atmosphere . Best local themed restaurant .

Title: Excellent experience for rock lovers
Review: Excellent experience for rock lovers. The food is good and you get the chance of seeing The New Creatures, Brian Jones' teardrop guitar, the original Abbey Road door and other memorabilia.

Title: Nothing Great
Review: My teenage daughters and I walked in one freezing cold January night after taking a nighttime bus tour. It was cozy warm and the wait only about 20 minutes. The food was okay but nothing great. The staff was friendly enough.

Title: flatbread
Review: Stopped in for a quick appetizer, we shared a Margherita Flatbread f , it was so delicious. Service was great, not overpriced.

Title: Better than expected
Review: Food was fantastic but portions are massive. Make sure when ordering desserts that you check whether it's for sharing or not! Service was great also.

Title: Consistently brilliant
Review: Came here with my husband and 2 friends. All of us had cocktails and food, both of which were amazing! The service was brilliant and I thoroughly enjoyed my time here! A must when in NYC

Title: Overrated
Review: This is a popular place for the very young teenage crowd. The wait time is a bit nuts especially for this type of restaurant!!!

Title: good food
Review: they have good food, burger, steak, fries, and some drinks. The one i dont like is the waiting. I understand the restaurant is in tourist place.

Title: if you like hair in your nachos
Review: extremely slow service , the food was good but we found a hair in our food !!! that usually ruins the show .

Title: One of the better HRC
Review: Late lunch with a 20 minute wait was OK. Our waiter Timothy did our order in his head and everything arrived as ordered after a short wait. It was great to leave a HRC without my ears bleeding - good style

Title: GREAT LOCATION, HUGE PORTIONS, LOVELY STAFF
Review: We popped in here for late lunch last Monday. Great atmosphere, lovely food, staff very friendly. Menu varied as you would expect, portion sizes HUGE.

Title: Wow
Review: The best burger I have EVER had. When they ask how you'd like it cooked you get an idea, but nothing prepares you. Insanely good!! Nom Nom

Title: Can't go wrong with Hard Rock
Review: This is the most impressive Hard Rock restaurant in terms of size, staff, food and memorabilia. We always go to Hard Rock because you know you'll have a great meal with great atmosphere.

Title: The best Restaurant I have ever been to
Review: Coming from New Zealand when I am lucky enough to visit New York I always ask if I can be taken to the Hard Rock Café for dinner. Being a huge music fan it really makes me so happy

Title: Memories of a lifetime
Review: The food, the ambiance, the music, the legacy.. well this place has everything of course. I enjoyed some fine drinks along with salmon, and will remember the good time forever..

Title: Hard rock care Times square NYC
Review: Typical Hard Rock, decent food , good atmosphere, can get very busy but always found a bsr seat. Great location, bit pricey but it is Times Square.

Title: Good food
Review: would recommend, we loved our visit, staff friendly, great service, food amazing but big portions, we went about 6 o'clock but restaurant seemed to get busy about 7ish,very spacious, we would go again

Title: It's the name
Review: Over the top. Friendly (too ....) staff, it is the name this place is populair. Food is not bad, but the magic (if it ever has been there) is gone, better spend your dollars in an other restaurant

Title: Not what I expected
Review: We have never been before and was disappointed , felt very dark and no atmosphere. Maybe it's out of season or a bit early in the day, not sure. We had a coffee and left. The staff were very welcoming and friendly.

Title: Consistent
Review: Been to Hard Rock in USA, Canada and Europe. All pretty much the same. Times Square location is conveniently located in the middle of everything. If you are a fan of Hard Rock this location will not disappoint.

Title: Service great!
Review: Allan rocks! We went in for drinks and appetizer! Allan was super friendly and gave us some great tips on seeing the city! Relaxed atmosphere!

Title: Can't go wrong with Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Really enjoyed the food as always! Cool venue in an old theatre. Food was good, service was friendly. Great location too.

Title: Gorgeous food
Review: Went here 2nights ago for dinner. Atmosphere was brilliant and food was delicious would highly recommend here. Food not badly priced either and portions massive. Staff very friendly and helpful

Title: It was the only restaurant open
Review: which is hard to believe in Times Square. We were actually the last people to be able to order food. I just got a salad, it was ok. I wouldn't choose to eat here, but the staff was nice and we could eat!

Title: Good food and service
Review: You pretty much know what you are going to get at hard rock, and we weren't disappointed! The ribs were lovely! Great service. Drinks a little pricey.

Title: If you like Hard Rock then this place is a MUST
Review: I like this HRC very much. I have been here now the second time already. The food is really good (like all hard rock cafes) and the staff is great.

Title: Hard Rock, LOVE IT !!!
Review: This location has never let me down. The service, the food, the experience...all of it is just great. This Hard Rock is a must when in Times Square.

Title: Always a great time!
Review: Our son loves the hard rock. Wherever we go we must stop at one. We have been coning to this one for years. He collects the guitar pins. The food is always good. The service is good and the drinks are always great!

Title: NYE at the HA\ard Rock
Review: Got married on NYE in Times Square and had our Reception at the Hard Rock. We were treated like Rock Stars and couldn't have been more pleased to bring in the new year at this place!

Title: Nice restaurant downtown
Review: Great location at times square. Good food, fast service. Prices are a bit expensive but i guess that is all over Manhattan. Recommended!

Title: Hard Rock
Review: Was very much as expected very nice and great atmosphere Easy to find in Time Square and it is next to Bubba Gumps

Title: good value
Review: burgers burgers and more burgers. oh and Natchos reasonable value for money but the same as any other hard rock cafe in the world

Title: Breakfast was tasty but it took AGES to arrive...
Review: Me and my boyfriend had breakfast here, I had French toast with bacon, he had some egg dish-the food was really enjoyable and it's a lovely venue, but we waited nearly 45 minutes after ordering to get the food. Pretty poor service.

Title: Delicious Hamburgers
Review: As all Hard Rock cafes the enviroment is awesome. Service was excellent. We tried a Strawerry lemonade that was delicious. Overoll we were very satisfied with our lunch,

Title: Not the best but simple fare for tourists.
Review: Went there after a late play for a burger. Burger was standard and nothing special but the fries were a little soggy. Typical price for NYC but better for a family as it is not above $$.

Title: Asked for ID lol
Review: Had cocktails here on our first night. The girl who served us asked me for ID Made my holiday and I had just arrived. Pricey but that's fair enough

Title: Lunch
Review: Did not enjoy food was not great Planet Hollywood was far better over priced for what it is Def will not return

Title: exciting night
Review: Good food. lovely atmosphere.. loud good music..quick service..live music ..very good singers....long queue..a wide menu with many specialties..meat, cheese, pizzas..international food and good drinks.

Title: What you expect from hard rock cafe
Review: My favourite Hard Rock Cafe from the many that I've been to. Situated in the middle of the Nathan of Times Square, the wait staff are very friendly and the food is quite decent.

Title: Fantastic atmosphere
Review: Great food and large choice of drinks. Brilliant atmosphere. The staff were very friendly and gave amazing customer service. Will be back again.

Title: It's alright.
Review: I've never really seen the big deal with hard rock cafe personally. Its overpriced, completely targets tourists and isn't particularly great. This one did have a nice atmosphere to it though and service is fine, so I can't really complain in that respect.

Title: BREAKFAST!!
Review: the breakfast.... one word OMG!" all you can eat and really good queality deffo worth a drop in to grab something to eat before a big day

Title: Time Square Meal with music
Review: The bar is situated close Time Square, it serves nice food, great drinks and as usual in Hard Rock you are surrounded by a nice music.

Title: Poor breakfast
Review: Wen't there for breakfast. For 20 bucks you get slow service, a list of few dishes to choose from and best of all you get to rewards this bad experience with 18% automatic gratuity. First disappointing visit to Hard Rock Cafe.

Title: Excellent
Review: Lovely and enjoyable meal, true American food, cocktails were beautiful and our waitress was very nice and helpful! Enjoyed the photo when we first got there

Title: Huge portions!
Review: Service toke quite a while but it was worth the time. Food is really good and high quality. Portions are huge. Waiters are friendly. But the beer I got wasn't too good tho. Overall of 4/5 stars. Hard Rock Cafe is never disappointing 👍🏻

Title: good food with friendly service
Review: family of four left feeling full. out the door under 100 dollars which we were very happy about. great location. Nice scenery and good music selection heard throughout our meal. would definitely return

Title: Great location, busy restaurant
Review: Got in at the right time and only had to wait 15 minutes for a table, waiter didn't seem over interested and we got our starters at the same time as our mains, but the food was really good!

Title: Great food etc etc
Review: Had a great meal here a couple of days ago, lunch time, ribeye steak, cooked to perfection, good , fast service,you will not be disappointed here .

Title: Night in the city
Review: Dinner was very good and service was terrific. Atmosphere was lively and fun! Great for family and / or groups.

Title: Addicted
Review: I collect this guitar pins and have for 30 years, so it's a must stop. Food is always great and the staff in the shop is super helpful.

Title: Chain eating on the Square
Review: The food is average. The wait staff is good at first but it is difficult to get a refill. You may only want to go to say you are at Hard Rock on Times Square.

Title: Noisy but nice friendly service
Review: The noise prevented any conversation but the music and surrounding paraphernalia was entertaining. The food servings were massive and when we asked if smaller serves were available we were told that our request couldn't be accommodated. What a waste of food!

Title: Don't go without a reservation
Review: Smaller menu than other HRC locations but of course pricier. I think about 20% more than the last time I went in September in Boston.

Title: Free with nyc passes
Review: All I can say is iam glad it was free with our nyc passes . Very busy don't know what all the fuss is about food not great wouldn't go again disappointed really .

Title: Great restaurant, very compatible to all other Hard Rocks
Review: Good service received here as can be expected from the HRC. Price is very reasonable given the environment and you don't feel rushed to finish your meal and get out. Located right on Times Square it's easy to find, however booking is definitely required!

Title: Very good!!
Review: Very good restaurant!! very good service very good food the place is beatiful. Recommends to eat there

Title: A truly Hard Rock Cafe in all its extent!
Review: A truly Hard Rock Cafe in all its extent! Great atmosphere, people from all over the world, great staff. Just take into account it gets very crowded.

Title: Great Food, friendly staff
Review: Sat at the bar since it was a 30 min wait for the dining room. The bartender was extremely friendly and the food was good. A little pricy but expected for Times Square.

Title: What experience am I paying for?
Review: Everybody says you should go to Hard Rock for the experience. After a fairly long wait, mediocre food, and an overpriced souvenir shop, I'm still confused as to what experience I invested in.

Title: Pretty good
Review: My husband and I ate here for drinks and lunch one day. The food was good and we tried 2 of their specialty cocktails. Both were good but neither were great. Pretty good place to grab a quick bite.

Title: Bargain breakfast!
Review: We stumbled upon this for breakfast one morning, and were happily surprised! For $17, you got a huge breakfast, beverage and tip included! Great food, and great service! Right next to Times Square!

Title: breakfast overpriced
Review: over priced brekfast, manged to lure me in with wifi only to find out that it didnt work, the food was ok but really expensive for what you get but hey it is what it is

Title: Average Food/Questionable Family Environment
Review: Food was average, server was energetic and friendly but the videos being shown on the screens were not for young eyes. Probably not a chain I will be rushing back to.

Title: Great place, great food
Review: Really enjoyed our meal, very reasonably priced and the atmosphere is fab. Servers really make the experience a memorable one. Book a table as soon as you can as it gets very very busy!

Title: Great surroundings, ok food
Review: The restaurant is exactly how one would envisage- glamorous, great atmosphere, really cashing in on its USP. The food was good but pretty blah, nothing too special. Definitely had an all-American feel to this place. Probably wouldn't go again though, having been the once.

Title: Hard Rock NYC
Review: We went to Hard Rock for dinner. They said it would be 45 min. To an Hour wait, but it was only 20 min.. Our waitress was really great, and our food was really good.

Title: Steak is amazing
Review: OMG! The steak was so good i couldnt finish it all. My only suggestion would be to ask for the next up of how you have it cooked at home, i asked for medium but it was more rare.

Title: Amazing atmopshere as expected!
Review: We stopped here for a few drinks and were able to sit at the bar. Loved the atmosphere and the service couldn't be faulted.

Title: The restaurant was neat but food was blaaaa
Review: The restaurant was a meet place but the food and service were pretty terrible. They butchered my order and did not fix it.Very busy because of the location and name but your definitely treated like just a number.

Title: Abfest to pre book
Review: Very busy. Usual Hard Rock Cafe. It is what it is. Good fun, quick food. Nothing fancy. We just used it as a stop off on the way back to our hotel

Title: Fantastic
Review: Me and my husband stopped here for an evening meal whilst on holiday in New York. We only waiting about 5 minutes for a table, service was great and the food was excellent it's worth a visit.

Title: Excellent
Review: Had the original burger fantastic ! Staff were really helpful and the memorabilia is fantastic . Chocolate molten cake was excellent
