Title: Great food and service
Review: No reservation on a very busy night but we managed to get a table for four. Waitress was very friendly and informative. Our drinks order came quick and food followed not long after that. Food was well presented, big portions and very tasty.

Title: very poor services
Review: We waited ages to be served, other people came in after us and had their meals before we even got our drinks! The food was good when it eventually came though. The drinks are not great though

Title: An evening in Times Square
Review: Were seated very quickly by very friendly staff, who took an interest in us. Food upto the usual standard for Hard Rocks. Very wheelchair friendly.

Title: Great food and service
Review: Typical Hard Rock.....managed to pre-book through open table and had a brilliant meal........Hard Rock never fail to deliver, great service as always!!!!!

Title: So good!
Review: This is a great place to come, listen to some good music, take in a great atmosphere, have a few beers and eat some great cooked food! The steak here was delicious and the staff are fantastic!

Title: Great atmosphere in Times Square
Review: Really good food and lots of cool things to see in here. A little bit of a wait to get a table, but worth it once we got in. Great music too!

Title: Decent Food but Slow Service
Review: If you have been to a Hard Rock then this is the same experience as all of the others. Overall the food was good but the service was kind of slow, we waited over an hour to get our food.

Title: Nice place, nice food!
Review: this place is very beautiful with a lots of table and a lots of people..but the service are fast and perfect! I advise you to eat Mexican burger... no words to describe....

Title: Great service!
Review: Service at the Hard Rock in Times Square was great! We didn't know we would get a free glass with our drink and they told us we would when we got our bill. Food was great, had a great time!

Title: ANNES Birthday
Review: Went here to celebrate my wife's Birthday . Booked a table beforehand. Excellant service excellant food . When I mentione it was my wife's birthday they put a candle in our shared ice cream ( Diabetic Nightmare) Pleasant surroundings good memorabilia on the walls.

Title: Fab!
Review: Ate here last week while on holiday in NYC, Food was really nice, Cocktails were fab! Atmosphere was amazing... It's right on Times Square so a perfect dinner before heading off to a show in Broadway!

Title: You know what to expect...
Review: I did visit many Hard Rock Cafe's worldwide and the concept is repeating and you don't get suprises. The menue is always Burgerish & Beerish and there is always a souvenier shop. Had a nice burger with beer and got treated very nicely.

Title: Just ok
Review: Loved the venue and the memorabilia, food was just ok. Felt we were rushed from start to finish. Constantly pressurised for either photo,charity band purchase, glass etc. If you want a quick bite then it's suitable.

Title: Ok place
Review: Sat down quite quickly after being shown to our table. When the food was delivered it looked very nice. I could not eat all of it as it was a good portion.

Title: Just like any other Hard Rock
Review: Not the best eatery in town however if looking for a quick bite to eat this a good place to go. I do like the rock memorabilia - it is fun!

Title: Good Food, very vibrant
Review: If you want a nice quiet romantic meal then HRC is not for you. The service was good, the food was good, but really noisy. Music and videos are playing all the time.

Title: Big Apple no big bill
Review: 8 of us, good value good service. Followed by a visit by the president. What a night, thank you hard rock

Title: Great Atmosphere
Review: Typical Hard Rock experience, very loud, very busy !!!! Food at this venue was very good. have had not so good food at other HR restaurants.

Title: Good food, great place full of iconic items just as expected
Review: Standard menu, we weren't disappointed, service was very nice! The collection is marvellous, I spent some time apologising to various groups in order to look at the items at their tables...

Title: Amazing atmosphere
Review: Loved this place so much. The staff are super friendly and the food was amazing. Reasonably priced and perfectly located. Loved the souvenirs.

Title: Hard Rock Cafe of New York
Review: I highly recommend for steak and burgers enthusiasts. Solid cousin, maybe a little overpriced but still good food. Big dishes tasty. Nothing to complain.

Title: As expected
Review: Chain with same menu, but good. Shopping also same as usual. Staff not helpful at all with same cramped store

Title: Fantastic!
Review: Always visit a Hard Rock where possible and this Hard Rock didn't disappoint. Great restaurant, food and service. Definitely worth a visit if in New York.

Title: Great Pizza and appetizers!!
Review: While visiting New York, I always get a souvenir from Hard Rock establishments and decided to have lunch and ate some amazing food!!! Not being known for their food, I was totally surprised how fresh everything tasted!

Title: Fine taste
Review: Must visit when you are in time square,which is close place. Taste is not only the factor,but pleasing environment for dining. Like other places,this branch also established professional manner

Title: Great experience
Review: First visit to any Hard Rock Cafe. They didn't disappoint, the service and food was excellent. We had cocktails too which were really good. To top it off we saw David Baddiel but my wife was too chicken to say hello.

Title: Good value for money
Review: A typical Hard Rock Cafe situated in the middle of Times Square. Both food and drink were reasonably priced and tasted good. There was a really nice atmosphere and if you want to watch sport there is a large screen.

Title: Great meal out
Review: Wonderful atmosphere in a classic hard rock venue. Great food and drink. Would go back again. Enjoy the alcohol free cocktails!

Title: They have the nicer staff in NYC
Review: I like music and I was happy to see all the collection guitars, shoes, dresses, etc belonging to "the very best" They had even the Abbey road real doors !! The food is very good, really tasty, and the staff was very very nice.

Title: Great evening in easy surroundings
Review: Been to several HRC and they never fail to satisfy. NYC Times Square Cafe is as good if not better than most. From the mayhem outside to a great atmosphere inside!

Title: Nice experience
Review: A little slow at the bar, but nice people doing a nice job! Centrally located in the heart of time square.

Title: Great Burger
Review: We were disappointed to find a queue at the Hard Rock Cafe and a half hour wait. We opted to take a seat at the bar and were able to eat there instead of waiting. Really great atmosphere and burger, very American!

Title: Great atmosphere, food and gift shop!
Review: Very impressed with this store, they have everything you'd expect from a Hard Rock franchise, however is the people that works there that make it special, not over the top, just right. I had a great lunch there too.

Title: Good food but freezing cold inside
Review: There is a lot of music memorabilia to look at. The food is good. However it is very cold inside and for us the music was far too loud.

Title: hard rock cafe as usual
Review: a MUST in new york! it's a nice place, a spectacular wall with only guitars. the food is the same as allover. so we entered only to the shop to buy some stuff.

Title: Just another Hard Rock Cafe
Review: There was nothing special about this HRC. Decent food and rock and roll atmosphere with lots of memorabilia. If you have never been to one then it is interesting but if you have been to any other one, nothing new here to see.

Title: Typical Hard Rock Tourist Trap
Review: Food is OK, but price, drinks are good but pricey. This is a Gard Rock Cafe, not too different tan others, pretty much exclusively for tourists or people that have not yer visited a Gard Rock Cagfe.

Title: Love The Atmospher
Review: Wow..just wow.. I went to 3 different hard rock cafe on my last trip.. and this HRC is the best. from the rock shop's collection, the atmospher, the location, the crwods, everything... The staffs also very helpful.

Title: Midnight stop
Review: Checked out the memorabilia , Beatles outfits from Ed Sullivan Show , Lady Gaga from Madame Treaseau's , Guitar wall!!! ... fun stuff... great bathrooms...

Title: Good service, average food
Review: The hard rock is overrated, I've been to a few and this wasn't anything spectacular. Crazy busy in this place, waited for 45 minutes for a table for two. Our server was great though as were most of the other waiters.

Title: Interesting
Review: Situated in bustling Times Square this is a very busy restaurant with pleasant and efficient staff, the food is good and the decor is brilliant. You could spend half an hour looking at the wall displays of music memorabilia. Well worth a visit.

Title: Nice restaurant
Review: The food was ok. I ordered a hamburger well done and it was almost well done. The decor is nice. Staff was very professional and friendly.

Title: Great atmostphere
Review: I love the laid back atmosphere, with the rock and top 20's music blaring. The food is great and in a centralized location in Times Square.

Title: Hardrock review
Review: Good dining experience. Bit pricey but you expect that for- 1) the chain & 20) Its location. Good service, a little noisy but great for music memorabilia lovers. I myself spent little time at the table, preferring to look around

Title: "Great Visit to check out all the Musician's History of our Time & More"
Review: We throughly enjoyed all the history of the Musician's of their time and to see all of the musical instruments right down to Billy Joel's motor bike. Friendly staff and well worth the visit if you are musically inclined.

Title: super experience
Review: I love atmosphere and environment of this franchise. One of the best choises in NYC. Try their coctails.

Title: Friendly service to the end
Review: Had a pre paid vochure which often creates a pronlem but not here! Fan time had b y us all! Well done!

Title: showing my age!!!
Review: Food good and plenty ,loved the burgers, staff cool and very busy ,but to me (only my opition)I found it a young persons place,very loud music, I should have expected this,showing my age,but go for it if you are young at heart and enjoy

Title: An experience to share
Review: Whether you are alone, traveling as a couple or with friends you have to stop by this place as it is not only historical in nature but has fantastic service and huge menu that should satisfy anyone.

Title: Great Burgers!
Review: Typical Hard Rock fare, we love their burgers!, Also dessert is always a favorite. Chocolate Cake YUM!

Title: 10yrs@times.sq
Review: This is one of my two favorite Hard Rock cafes in the whole world. It is located at Times square, where its been for 10 years. This restaurant and its merchandise shop are always busy. Good vibes, good food, good service!

Title: First Visit
Review: Strange as it may seem this was my first visit to this chain it will not be my last. I'm not usually a fan of burgers but the ones here could certainly convert me. It was delicious! Look forward to my next visit

Title: Great place
Review: Great place for food, atmosphere and the service is fast. The price is a bit expensive but everything else is worth the detour

Title: Fun!
Review: We had lunch here during our recent family trip to NYC. Kids and adults enjoyed the atmosphere a lot. Nice opportunity to get picture taken with kids holding guitars against "guitar wall". Food was good, but not great. Overall an enjoyable experience.

Title: Less than what expected!
Review: It is similar to other franchise store all over the world except the abundance of security personnel everywhere. The bar was good and bar tenders are professional but not compare to other cool places all over NYC.

Title: Don't bother, it's not good
Review: Went for breakfast and it was not good. Both the food and service were not good at all unfortunately. There are many other far better places in the area to go to

Title: Great diner
Review: Good food, good atmosphere, great dining experience. Very large dining area, but advise to go earlyish as a queue was already forming at 18:00..

Title: Expensive
Review: This restaurant was very costly for very average food and drinks. We couldn't finish our food as it was tasteless, I had the macaroni which was quite sickly.

Title: Average and Overpriced
Review: Average food although Service was good. Had to wait for 30 minutes for a table but could have a drink at the bar. Drinks and food a little overpriced for what it is.

Title: Not worth the line
Review: The food here is average at best, on par with any chain restaurant the draw is the rock memorabilia. Very cool memorabilia on display, does not make up for over priced average food items. Kids menu provides nice coloring book/souvenir

Title: A must try - original burger is outstanding
Review: Walking the area of Times Square renders hundreds of restaurants, but Hard Rock is a must try. Museum and surroundings gives you a great setting, food is good quality and prices are, considering the neighbour hood, reasonable. In addition good cocktails and nice desserts.

Title: Hard Rock Cafe Times Square
Review: Loved this place, from the memorabilia, to the staff and the food!! Bought quite a lot of stuff from the shop too as my kids collect their T Shirts from wherever they go.

Title: Buzzin'
Review: Usual Hard Rock set up with brilliant surroundings and great atmosphere. Went twice, once just for beers and enjoyed. Returned night after for food and was not disappointed.

Title: Rockin on Time Square
Review: The restaurant had tons of memorabilia. We enjoyed our meal, however seating was a little congested.

Title: The best....so far!
Review: I've been to Hong Kong, Barcelona, Mumbai, Paris, London,Edinburgh and Glasgow but this is the best so far for memorabilia and atmosphere.

Title: Hard Rock NYC
Review: Obvious ambiance. Great server and friendly staff. Barbecue ribs were somewhat tasteless and not very meaty. Onion rings were a bit soggy.

Title: Always wanted to visit here...glad I did
Review: Great vibe love the theatre style of this place and music theme, bar staff a little officious asking for ID I wasn't flattered I found it annoying, I'm 50 for crying out loud Bit expensive for basically burger and chips

Title: Fun place. Alot to see and great casual food.
Review: Nice staff, great food and a lot of fun. If you are looking for a casual place to dine, this would be the place.

Title: Great!
Review: Had a great Piggy Sandwich here on my birthday and got a free hot fudge sundae. Server was fun and friendly and efficient. Food was delicious and I didn't have to wait long for it.Super atmosphere.

Title: Good food
Review: We waited a long time for dinner but it was totally worth it. The food was very good and we enjoyed our meal.

Title: Times Square Hard Rock
Review: Good choice if you are in Times Square area. Food was great and so was the service. Enjoyed everything about the restaurant.

Title: Food
Review: Great fun and music. Expensive but entertaining. Happened to be there on my birthday and they sang happy birthday and gave me my choice of dessert. Fun!,,,,,

Title: Amazing as always at hard rock cafe's!
Review: Visited twice on our recent NY trip. As always our experience at hard rock the service was great - very attentive and friendly and fantastic food wth huge portions. Loved it!

Title: Great Restaurant and souvenir shop
Review: i stopped by after i had dinner in bubba gump restaurant. i bought t shirt and other souvenir. It is located in a very strategic location in Broadway

Title: Good food...high prices..fun place
Review: Food was above average in quality....quantity was large....price was high....but you are in Times Square!!! Go for it as a one time experience. Really noisy.

Title: Pretty typical Hard Rock experience.
Review: Your typical Hard Rock. Overpriced drinks, loud music, and a crowd. It is generally what you would expect it to be.

Title: overall brilliant... like always
Review: The food was excellent and the service great. Not to much noise and not to crowded. Will definitely go there again.

Title: good meal - busy place
Review: This is a high energy and large HRC. No wait when we were there (lucky on that front). It's big and busy inside - fun - kids loved it. Food and service were both very good. Great experience.

Title: Breakfast Buffet was ok
Review: $17 per person for all you can eat buffet, food was ok, but not great. Service a bit slow but friendly. Central location by Time Square

Title: central location, food consistent
Review: Like most Hard Rocks around the world, this is the same. You know what to expect! The burgers are good, the children looked after and the music loud. A great location in Time Square if you're willing to wait a little. The line moves quick.

Title: Cool store, meal not worth the wait
Review: We go to every Hard Rock when we travel. I'd go here if you collect trinkets, but elsewhere for a meal, especially in NYC

Title: Amazing:)
Review: Good restaurant in good place near Times Square . Three are a lot of amazing things. Staff was OK too.

Title: Hard rock cafe
Review: Wanted a quick burger meal on way to a Broadway play down the street. Hard Rock Cafe was on the way so we went in. Got that burger in the bar area. Quicker service than the dining area.

Title: Not a Better View of Times Square
Review: Lunch at the Hard Rock Café on Times Square may not be unique and exciting, but it has predictably good food and the best seat in the house for Times Square.

Title: The Hard Rock is Not What it Used to Be.
Review: A once reliable place to go for a decent meal at an okay price. This Times Square location has been a nightmare since it opened. How things have changed since the Hard Rock's 57th Street days and not for the better I'm sorry to say.

Title: NYCHRC!
Review: Another great Hard Rock Cafe'!!! This is a " must stop" when in NYC!!!! Great Time! The Ribs are to die for. The décor here is fabulous and the service is outstanding!!!

Title: 50th birthday meal
Review: Mediocre meal and service just something that you gotta do if you come to new york wouldn't go again had better burgers and ribs in hells kitchen

Title: Great food
Review: We had a great meal here, service was excellent and the fiid was plentiful and tasty. Great location too.

Title: Such good food!
Review: A short wait of 10 mins, our waitress was lovely and engaging. Our food arrived quickly, hot and massive! The food was so good.... Would recommend this place only negative is it really is quite loud!

Title: The rocking place...
Review: In NYC, I love Hardrock, why not. Location: Can't miss it Price: to expensive Food: greasy and pub food... Service: great Looking for an experience..go for it! G

Title: Good value
Review: good food here you get plenty it seemed to be extra loud with the music could hardly hear yourself speak but enjoyed it anyway service very good and quick

Title: Amazing place at Times Square!
Review: Nice place amazing atmosphere, excellent atmosphere with great service and good food. take a place at the bar and enjoy!!

Title: One of the best Hard Rocks
Review: The food in Hard Rock is mainly the same but the atmosphere and exhibits here make this one of the betterHard Rocks, nice at,ops here in side and didn't have to wait to long despite it being busy. Large shop as well

Title: Just ok
Review: Was not as good as I remembered the last time I was there. Didn't feel satisfied when we left. However the guitar pictures were cute and fun. And there was no wait for a table!

Title: Just typical Hard Rock really, you could have been anywhere in the world in an HR Cafe
Review: As with every Hard Rock Café I have ever been in, the menu was just as you would expect, service was good, food nice etc. He arrived about 9.30pm and waited around 10 mins for a table so no issues.

Title: Worth a visit
Review: Great space in the madness of Times Square. Great to get away from the hustle outside and escape into a world of rock memorabilia. We went at 5pm and were seated immediately. Food was quick and tasty with large portions and the service was great.

Title: Always a treat
Review: Right in the center of Times Square! A great place to grab a beverage and a bite to eat while touring the city.

Title: Excellent
Review: By far the best steak I had in NY, it was cooked perfectly, the mash potato was great as well and the green beans were cooked to perfection, I know where I'm going next time,

Title: Gòod
Review: This Hard Rock Cafe is good..The food here is very good.The prices similar to other restaurants around here. The set is slow because it's always very crowed.

Title: Fun!
Review: Typical restaurant but the chain is still one of my favorites. Loved the margarita flight sampler that comes with chips. Got seated quickly and server was nice.

Title: Great Entertainment!
Review: We went to see Darlene Love she was having a rehearsal there and her performance was great! The food was just average burgers, salads, sandwiches etc..I would'nt waste my time going there just for dinner only.

Title: Nice, as usual
Review: Had to wait 40 minutes to get a table. Crowded as it was, it took a while to get our order. When it finally arrived, it wasn't correct. Great hot fudge brownie, though. They got that right, at least.

Title: don't bother
Review: busy, rather dirty and dull. we ended up sitting in the old dance floor - food was average and the beer like drinking soap. tables sticky .... very disappointed can't say I'd go back

Title: Amazing.
Review: Great atmosphere and surroundings. The staff are very friendly. Food and drink menu's great. Would definately go back.

Title: Fun + food
Review: Stumbled there after watching evening show on Broadway. The place is fun, the food is good. It was a perfect end to a wonderful evening in Manhattan.

Title: Still rocking !
Review: After many years (a decade) this place still rocks. Good feeling, fast and clean service. Cold beer, BIG cocktails and basic, but tasty food. What else do you need ?

Title: Meal
Review: Service slow, beer flat, burger tasteless, price high, location great, seating comfortable, decoration good

Title: meal out
Review: We have been to a few hard rock cafes and this one didn't disappoint one bit, great service as always, food fantastic and very filling, atmosphere excellent good beer. Make sure you pre book or be prepared to wait for an hr or more. 10/10

Title: Fantastic experience, as I've come to expect from Hard Rock!
Review: As always, had a great meal from Hard Rock! Awesome atmosphere, one of the best I've been to. Will definitely be back!

Title: Great Hard Rock experience as expected.
Review: Stopped in here for a late lunch whilst visiting Times Square. Drinks were made quickly and refreshingly cold. Food could have been better but was edible and satisfying nonetheless. Server was very attentive and welcoming, great musical artefacts and items on show too.

Title: best brekfast deal
Review: $17 for all you can eat breakfast .toast bacon saus egg fruit cereal tea coffee pastries .so go enjoy

Title: Love love love
Review: Always love the Hard Rock Cafe brand, NYC is one of my favourite restaurants that I have visited, customer service is always top notch, food always delicious, always reasonably priced, can't wait to go back :)

Title: Awesome!
Review: Greates Place to have burgers. These werde just delicous, yummy and a big dish. Friendly and outgoing waiter, and Music playing all Night Long. All in all a fun Dinner.

Title: Despite its location and number of customers, very good
Review: Its so busy here, but the good and service was surprisingly good. Food delivered very quickly, staff were attentive, all good.

Title: Great food great service
Review: Visited Hard rock cafe when we were in NYC last autumn - really good food and very friendly and quick service. Very easy location and handy for when you want to stop for a quick dinner!

Title: Typical HRC fare
Review: You know what you are going to get from a HRC and this one was no different. Nice service, ok food but nothing special. Ok if you want a quick bite to eat.

Title: Love the place!
Review: Just in the middle of the square, where all the buzz is. You have to come and drink a hot chocklate when its cold out side. I loved the people there and the music as well.

Title: Lovely food, but the air conditioning meant we felt it too cold to stay long
Review: Another good restaurant to visit serving lovely food but this year we found it was very cold in the restaurant due to the air conditioning, which meant our food went cold very quickly.

Title: Convenient and fun.
Review: It was nice to have a restaurant nearby where they serve you. I like that they take a picture of you when you enter. The place is huge. The atmosphere and food was good.

Title: Great food, atmosphere, and service.
Review: This particular Hard Rock is conveniently located in Times Square. We stopped in for lunch and received top-notch service. The food was cooked as requested.

Title: better for a family meal I think
Review: Some of the drinks don't have prices on them and we found out why when we got the bill, $17 for 1 average cocktail. We waited a long time for those drinks as well. Tasting platter was ok.

Title: you cant go wrong!
Review: nice option to have dinner and enjoy good music and food Pros Memorabilia Music enviroment Cons well it is not a con, but once you heva tried a Hard rock the food is the same every otherone

Title: Hard Rock Gluten Free!
Review: Good food at a reasonable price for a chain restaurant. Gluten free options available, they have GF burger buns....so you can have virtually any burger....fries are safe also. Helpful staff and reasonably short wait times.

Title: No waiting!
Review: This place is HUGE! It's right in the heart of Times Square. Excellent food, our waitress was on the ball and the prices were similar to other HRC's.

Title: The time of my life
Review: It was a fabulous time. The food was great and what was good is that you could see all the memorabilia around and that was fantastic

Title: Rock And Eat
Review: A local rock really, friendly Staff. Good music for an evening trasgressive. Please return to Hard Rock New York :-)

Title: Well located at times square
Review: My husband and I found it open on a weekday night when everything around was already closed...we shared a sandwich with a couple of drinks and a milkshake at the bar.

Title: Wedding anniversary trip
Review: Great atmosphere , location is good, food was nice and hot. Just how you'd expect a hard rock to be .

Title: An experience out of the movies
Review: To get away from busy Times Square enter into planet Hollywood on the upper levels, great burgers but watch out for the overloud music A great place to see exhibits from movies and future movies to see

Title: Best Nachos!!
Review: We had a wonderful waitress and the staff couldn't have been more accomodating! Nachos were wonderful and could easily be split between two people. Will definitely be back on a return trip to NYC.

Title: cool place to stay
Review: we went there for dinner, was very nice, we had to wait a bit but nothing terrible. The food quality was quite good and the service fast and friendly.

Title: Great atmosphere
Review: We were slightly worried after reading previous reviews on this restaurant. However, our waitress was very friendly, our food arrived promptly and it was very good. We would definitely visit again.

Title: The original!
Review: Excellent service! Awesome food - typical American, and not only! Great attraction! You can buy souvenirs there too.

Title: Not the best
Review: Location is excellent , the business is excellent , service is ok , but the design Ian's atmosphere is not as good as others I have been to in the same chain . Box like and not enough screens and music volume too low .

Title: GOOD FOOD
Review: The food and service were amazing and the atmosphere was cool and inviting. The kitchen sent the food out quickly, with a great presentation and it was all amazing

Title: Like all the other hard rocks
Review: It is exactly what you expect it to be, just like every other Hard Rock Cafe. The vibe is ok. The wait staff was fine. The food was average a bit over priced for a upscale burger joint

Title: Terrible
Review: I have visited many Hard Rock restaurants before and I am not a big fan but this one top as one of the worst ones. The food and service were terrible. The cheeseburger is their "main dish" and it was edible. Not worth the visit.

Title: Great experience
Review: I am a seasoned HRC eater but not been for a few years. They knew their food, knew what was gluten free and it was all delicious. 8yr old loved it. Had to wait about 20 mins for a table but that was fine.

Title: Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Service is perfect. Meali ara delicious. Meal portions are bigger than we used to eat. A funny and quality restaurant.

Title: Fun meal / great service
Review: For a chain restaurant close to a huge tourist area, this was a great meal. Great service and good food in a fun atmosphere - just what we were looking for.

Title: Great food and fun atmosphere
Review: Good variety on menu. I tried the Princess Diaries fruit smoothie. Very good! Great location in Times Square too.

Title: Meh...
Review: Very average food, ok'ish setting. Our waitress was rude when we indicated that our drink was not as ordered. Would not rush to go back...

Title: Tasty meal in Time Square
Review: Tasty meal while visiting Time Square.. Didn´t wait long for a table. Its your basic american restaurant.

Title: Good food, long wait
Review: I visited this establishment with my family. The wait was a bit long but once we were seated the service was amazing. I assume it's a tourist attraction so waiting comes with that.

Title: Great atmosphere NO PRICES DISPLAYED ON MENU
Review: Always busy great place to soak up atmnosphere and good food but VERY DEAR . I have been a few times and loved it .

Title: No surprise
Review: Freezing cold in the room, waiting quite a long time for our burgers which were not so nice in the end. Cocktails were more icy than anything else expected... Food was not bad but not exciting!

Title: New York - Hard Rock - same feeling - Awesome
Review: Cannot go wrong with the Burgers out here, a must for every one who Visits New York, Friendly Staff and service as impeccable as always...keep Rockin

Title: You are not allowed to get a drink!!!
Review: We came into this "bar" around 11pm when we found all the bar stools taken. We took other chairs at a table but we were denied these places. So we stood at the bar area but were not allowed to!! Who runs this fake place?

Title: Hard Rock Rocks in all countrys!
Review: I visited this place with a friend and we have the most fun time, you can take pictures with famous guitars, the decoration is very avant-garde. Excellent food and great atmosphere for a drink and relax. I loved it!

Title: Hard Rock rocks like rock song
Review: Typical Hard Rock Cafe Experience! Daughter LOVED the lemonade. Everything else was, well, Hard Rock Cafe. The place is huge and I can imagine a long line on busy days. However, we went on a slow day and everything went smoothly.

Title: Fun place
Review: Loved it. Great atmosphere. And a Michael Jackson impersonator came out and entertained the crowd while we ate dinner. We like to hit the Hard Rock in every city we visit.

Title: Packed with punch
Review: A lively buzz began with our server and continued throughout the meal, a great location, noise, atmosphere and we were served efficiently and with charm. Photo opportunities abound and there is plenty on the menu to engage diners. This deserves return visits.

Title: Very busy but worth it.
Review: Though this is generally a tourist spot in any city, this store was enjoyable in its own right. Extremely busy, but you are able to sit at the bar and order off the full menu. I was in and out in about 30 minutes.

Title: Good lunch
Review: Good place for lunch. Tasty sandwiches and good service. Lots of memorabilia to look at while you wait. We didn't have to wait for a table, but there was a long line when we left.

Title: Restful Reward
Review: We had walked an awful lot and the Hard Rock Café had no wait, had wonderful service and the food was delicious! You don't want to miss it!

Title: Quality food, great vibe
Review: Food was fantastic, staff were quirky and very friendly. Decorations very interesting. Would recommend booking in advance to avoid waiting!

Title: fun place to eat and shop!
Review: I love Hard Rocks everywhere....I ate nachos this time but they have the best burgers!! Our service was good and I love the fun upbeat music and entertainment. I have to shop and look at memorabilia too....

Title: Good for a break
Review: The service was good and all the burgers come with french fries and sauce and they are very big. It's perfect for a little break for lunch and to spend some time with the family.

Title: Great food and fun for families
Review: Took our teenage grandson to celebrate as part of his graduation trip to NYC. Great place to eat and interesting decor. Would definitely go here again

Title: Burgers with a bonus
Review: We had a great dinner at the hard Rock and the lip sync by one of the waiters to lady Gaga was an added bonus! Our waitress was very attentive. My son loved his burger & the nachos were yummy too!

Title: Absolute awful
Review: Over priced service is terrible. Breakfast was a shambles would rather of given my money to the tramps outside than to this awful rip off restaurant.

Title: overpriced
Review: very busy place with interesting rock decorations, we needed to que and wait for 15 min. the service was very basic, the food was overpriced..

Title: I don't get it
Review: Why do so many tourists flock to this chain restaurant? With so many other places to visit in NY and better food to eat, why go here?

Title: Good Food & Atmosphere
Review: Made to feel very welcome, Bar man was really helpful and professional. Food was excellent. Would return if in New York again.

Title: my favourite cafe
Review: I like this brand and it is always on a high level. Good interior,good food but prices are not cheap. Good american place

Title: Nice atmosphere
Review: The food is okay but the atmosphere is good. Nice photo opportunity area where you can take your own photo in front of Hard Rock background. The large guitar hanging over the stairway is neat.

Title: Great lunch in Times Square
Review: Right near center of Times Square, was told 25 min wait on a Sat afternoon, buzzer given and waiting area is big, buzzed in only 10 min. Air conditioning felt great on July day. Server very friendly, all our lunches were very good

Title: Very Basic Breakfast
Review: Went here for breakfast. Not much to say other than poor choice and quality of food (served in a buffet style) with an expensive price tag. The redeeming feature would be the building itself which was interesting to take a look around.

Title: Great steak and atmosphere
Review: We were able find a seat at the bar right away. Bar tender was great. Food was cooked to order and the service was awesome.

Title: Music and Food - Fabulous!
Review: The Hard Rock Cafe was a truly fabulous experience. The atmosphere was fun and the food was excellent. The wait staff were very friendly and attentive. I would highly recommend this venue.

Title: Great atmosphere, average food
Review: Just like any other Hard Rock Cafe around the world, you should firstly visit to see the memorabilia as there is always something that you will have never seen before. As for the food, I ordered the Legendary Bacon Cheeseburger and was disappointed.

Title: good food as usual - very poor service
Review: the place is as good as usual, the food is so good as usual, but what a deception about staff attitude, poor service, long service, so unusual over there. not good at all

Title: Fun Experience - Food is Average
Review: This is a good place to stop in and have a drink to see all the music memorabilia etc. There is much better food throughout the City however the location in Time Square is easy to find and get to walking.

Title: Great experience
Review: Good food, good service, lot's of interesting memorabilia to look at while you wait for a table. Been twice, would go again.

Title: Nice food , great memorabilia, good experience
Review: We visited the shop and since there were tables available we also have visited the restaurant. The food was great, the memorabilias were perfect and the staff very friendly. We loved it.

Title: Alright
Review: I was excited to visit Hard Rock in NY. The wait was not as long as I thought it would be. We were seated and the waiter came over fairly quickly, Food was delicious, friendly wait staff. Would go again.

Title: Waitting list worth it
Review: See the memorabilia, take a lot of pics, food is American what else cocktails great people all over world

Title: MEH.
Review: Very Busy of course, service sucked but overall it was your normal experience for Hard Rock. Over priced, busy, poor service but atmosphere is always fun and entertaining!

Title: Just awesome
Review: One of the best places to hangout in Time Square. Just order anything from the menu, it will be great. Do try nachos and Long island iced tea.

Title: Legendary
Review: Ambience of this place rocks. Wide variety of yummy cocktails. Just wish they had prices on the menu. Food ok. First place my hubby said of "before we leave NY, I'm definitely coming here for a second visit "

Title: Appetizers
Review: We were not very hungry so ordered just appetizers. Great service . Always tory to eat at a Hard Rock Café to see the décor.

Title: Fast service
Review: We visited with a group and a pre-selected menu. 72 of us served very quickly and the food was good.

Title: Good food
Review: Great place for lunch. Hamburgers and salads delicious. Memorabilia is really interesting. Staff very efficient.

Title: Standard experience, but no prices on the wine list
Review: The food, service and ambience was the same as always. Good experience, exactly what we expected. However, the wine list had no prices. How can I decide what to order if I don't know what it is going to cost?

Title: Good service and friendly staff in a great location
Review: Great location, staff in the restaurant where very friendly and polite, food was good. Food and drinks served promptly. Also very good atmosphere in the restaurant with lots of memorabilia on the walls. Highly recommended.

Title: Average
Review: For Hard Rock Cafe the bar is really ok but with the burger we have been little disappointed especially as you know you pay more as its a Hard Rock Cafe. So go there if you like the atmosphere but not because of food.

Title: Average
Review: This place has nothing on the Orlando one. The low rating is justified. Food was average. Service was slow. Not her fault, she no doubt had heaps of tables to attend to.

Title: Average
Review: Had burgers from a speciality menu. They were of good quality, but dull. Have visited HRC in many countries and this place was below average.

Title: hard rock new york
Review: good burgers good location . lots of rock and music items. excellent service set in an old theatre gets very busy.

Title: Always fun
Review: Always a great place to visit. Dinner, snacks, cocktails, atmosphere always hard to beat. And of course you have to pick up a pin or a t-shirt

Title: Food as expected, waiter in a bad mood
Review: HRC NYC is large. Not crowded when we visited the place. Food was classic HRC as expected. Service was not. Our waiter had something to learn about being polite. There are better places to eat in NYC.

Title: Fab cocktails
Review: Cocktails really good each night we would finish off our day in Hard Rock Cafe, staff great and they make great cocktails .

Title: So so
Review: Very disappointed with this restaurant. Service was slow food very disappointing. Music far too loud. Fancy stuff around the walls but that's it. Avoid

Title: Yum
Review: Every time I've been here it's always busy didn't have to wait too long at all thanks to the rain Great food great staff and visited gift shop too Would come back again

Title: Luch, dinner yes, skip breakfast
Review: We thought we'd have a good, hearty breakfast here, but it was just like any other bad motel buffet table. Price wasn't too bad $17, but it wasn't worth it.

Title: very good
Review: the concept is probably known to everyone, the food is excellent and the service friendly and proffesional, and you can see some ''relics'' from stars, it isnt the cheapest but for once it cant hurt

Title: Usual standard
Review: Great place, lovely staff. Food was great. Had photo taken but was not asked to purchase it. Also visited for cocktails which are very impressive.

Title: Love it!!
Review: We felt like at home. The service was great all the time and I would like to make an special mention to Garfield, a good man with a fantastic sense of humor. Thanks Garfield!!

Title: great food
Review: great food great place and great staff went inside to chill before a flight and the staff could not have been nicer

Title: AMERICAN BURGERS
Review: Went to a wedding do there had burgers and a dreadful cheesecake there,poor service,was not busy,plastic covers,a half cooked burger with bacon and cheese ,not good,worst cheesecake ever,no cream or anything with a plain new york cheesecake.

Title: It's a Hard Rock Cafe!!
Review: Came in for lunch, it was busy but we were well taken care of and the food came quickly. Everything was great... It's a HRC and it does exactly what you expect from one.

Title: Good burger and great venue
Review: Large and interesting space, burgers were good, pleasant enough place to have a couple of beers. It felt like the chain it has become, reliable.... yes, but not quite as unique as it used to be. Would return though.

Title: Good for a quick bite
Review: We stopped here for a quick meal before a show. Nice food but nothing special. Great location for a pre Broadway bite to eat.

Title: Excellent
Review: a really nice way to close my first day @ ny really good food. really good staff. I had a very good time there..

Title: Great service, great location
Review: No matter how crowded the place is, you will get top quality food, and outstanding service. Fantastic location, right in the heart of Times Square.

Title: Same as the others
Review: Long wait, I like Hard Rocks but went because my daughter wanted too. With so many restaurants to choose from in NYC I would not choose again. Drinks and food were fine. You of course went through gift shop to get in .

Title: Great
Review: I love it and I would definitely go there more than once. Good music, much space, not smoky, nice bathrooms. Prices fine and staff cool!

Title: Very mediocre
Review: Food was very average. Poor beer selection. The atmosphere pails in comparison to other hard rock cafes around the world. And the service? Absolutely shocking!!!!! 30 mins to place an order - 30 mins to get the first round of drinks. Shocking.

Title: Spareribs!!!!
Review: We had to wait half an hour, but the food was very good. Price is ok 😉 I was surprised about the really delicious and spicy spareribs

Title: Food was great
Review: Nice atmosphere. Great menu copious amount of food! Reasonably priced. Plenty room. Tried to eat there a second time during our trip, however left it too late to get a table. Would definately recommend

Title: lovely food
Review: I love the hard rock cafe. The food is amazing and the staff are extremely friendly. Myself and my husband ate here 4 times during our stay in new York. I strongly recommend.

Title: Fun Atmosphere
Review: A Big well rounded menu. Great drink selection in the Bar. Friendly staff and plenty of seating available.

Title: Great cocktails friendly staff
Review: Stopped here after a long day of sightseeing in NYC. Busy and great atmosphere. Bar staff were all very friendly. Plenty of choice on the cocktail menu. We had 2 each and they all tasted beautiful would defiantly visit again

Title: Nice spot!
Review: Incredibly, in all my visits to NY I had not come to the HRC. Sat by the bar and had a decent meal and a good time listening to new and old tunes!

Title: Amazing
Review: Love this place, tasty food, wondeful things inside, the wall with guitars, the Beatles at the entrance. The location just in front of times square. I wish to have the chance to come more often.

Title: Great Service
Review: I have dietary restrictions which required a special order that was handled with no problem at all. Thank you to Kelly who was a wonderful waitress. I recommend to anyone who is in New York to stop in.

Title: A load of fuss about nothing special
Review: Had to try it while in Manhattan. Nothing special, except the service, Danny was a real credit to a very average dining experience. Food was ok but there is so. Much better around,and not at sch a cost.

Title: Always a favorite
Review: Hard Rock Cafe is always a favorite, because it's a great value and good food. They are very good at dealing with crowds, and move people in and out efficiently.We enjoy looking around at the unique music collectors items at each restaurant.

Title: fantastic food
Review: the staff are friendly the food was excellent and a great meal after a long flight. Burgers to die for!!!!!!!!!

Title: Fun place
Review: Good food! Cool place!! With lots of famous artistes memorabilia. Our waiter was really fun and helpful! We had a very good non-alcohol drink with mango,

Title: not as good as expected
Review: we regulary visit this chain everywhere we go, apart from the place needing a good clean, the food was medioca and the shop was very small and boring

Title: That's a great place.
Review: Been there alone I think but this place gather really cool people who likes music and quality service.

Title: great food
Review: The food was great and the atmosphere was really nice too. This was by far the best place we ate while in NYC.

Title: yup just another Hard Rock
Review: They are all the same so when you have been to one you have been to them all. good service, good food, good value nothing great but nothing bad.

Title: The original Hard Rock Cafe really delivers
Review: The original Hard Rock Cafe really delivers their specialties and we were very impressed with the food even the children had nice ones.

Title: Night out
Review: Love the restaurant food was good and the restaurant had a lot of attractions from movies. all of us had so much fun a alot of different kinds of food to order and drinks and enjoyed everything love everything about it.

Title: Relaxed enjoyable evening
Review: The atmosphere has a rocky relaxed theme which is perfect for after a day of shopping or sight seeing. There was a variety of food and there were music channels playing so we had a little singalong.

Title: great meal
Review: only had to wait 30 minutes which was enough time to see around all the memrorabilia and gift shop. food was tasty with huge portions service was quick considering how busy the place was.

Title: Well worth a visit
Review: Went for food and the queue was 1.5hrs, however if you go to the bar for a drink while you wait you can eat there and you are effectively skipping the queue, which was excellent for us. Try the New York strip, was very nice.

Title: Been here a few times when we visit, this was by far the most disappointing.
Review: Had dinner here in December with my friend & our four teenagers. Our server was nice, but our orders were incorrect, items were omitted. Food was not as good as it had been in the past. Very disappointing especially for the price you pay.

Title: Not worth the wait!!
Review: we waited in the queue for 20 mins to be seated. the music was great, however the food was not worth the wait or the $$ our waiter was very friendly !

Title: Love this place!
Review: Fantastic food, fantastic staff and fantastic memorabilia. We plan to visit as many Hard Rocks around the world as we can.

Title: Cool !
Review: Like every hard rock in the world 👍👍👍 cool !!! Good music, confortable waiters and also some of them sing, that is great. A good place to visit.

Title: Bad experience
Review: The last time I went to NY, the team's Hard Rock was not as cut as usual. I had problems with the collection of the account on travel card, but that was resolved days later by the manager.

Title: Never disappoints!
Review: Visited during our stay in NYC and it didn't disappoint. We love a good meal in a great atmosphere and we got it all. Had the legendary burger and it was delicious! Would most certainly go to this one again.

Title: Beer and music....
Review: huge place,.... nice guitar wall,....!!! Went in for a couple of beers,...nice choice, good music too, trip back down memory lane, 80's style. Friendly staff.

Title: really enjoyed the food
Review: very good food. very good beer and very friendly staff. the man serving us was very kind and helpful in helping us find our way to our next destination. their mac and cheese is yum

Title: Good experience
Review: Quick service once your seated, good choice of food! Food was good nothing special but the atmosphere is great! The shop is good too.

Title: It's decent but nothing massively special
Review: Worth going because the burgers are delicious. Prices aren't the best but worth going whilst in nyc I suppose. Burgers are good

Title: Great service - great cocktails!
Review: we only went in to the shop and ended up going for cocktails - they were yummy and not too expensive! the service was great and we would've gone back in to eat if we hadn't run out of time!!

Title: Great Service
Review: This was a must see. Inside was huge, lots of rock memorabilia, almost felt like a museum. Food was lovely and well cooked and reasonably priced. Served by a lovely gentleman called Chad who made our day!

Title: Really Good
Review: We only had drinks in fairness, however, the drinks were really good and we had good service with it. Worth a visit for a drink.

Title: DISGRACE!!!!!!!
Review: So disappointing!!!!! Staff unfriendly, Food crap and bathrooms ABSOLUTLEY filthy dirty!!!!!! Don't waste your time or money!!!!!

Title: Great Food and Atmosphere!
Review: We have eaten her quite a few times and have never been disappointed. Burgers are a must! The staff are always polite and helpful. The restaurant always has a great atmosphere! Love it!

Title: The Usual Hard Rock
Review: If you have been to one Hard Rock, you pretty much have been to them all. I enjoy the Rock Memorabilia at each location that is different so I always stop in when traveling. Also their vegetarian burger is great!

Title: All Rock enthusiast must stop were legends were!
Review: Its nice to stop in this place, the place where showman performed! You can go through the legends exhibits. You can take photos of these icons!

Title: Great food
Review: Been to others and this is hands down the best. Food was delicious and the bacon topped hard shake is a taste sensation. It's not cheap for dinner but it's worth it for the wings. And the pulled pork. And the skins too :)

Title: Great time
Review: we had great drinks and food, atmosphere was very welcoming and the waiter was very helpful. When we go back to NYC we will def go back again.

Title: Familiar quality
Review: Although this must be one of the world's best locations among Hard Rock Cafes, the food, service and atmosphere never seem to change. Great place to sit back and simultaneously process your food and experiences.

Title: Best burger
Review: The best location for a big and jucy burger, simply hard Roch culture. Must visit if in town. Careful with desert :)

Title: You must buy their souvenirs ...
Review: Eating there is not a big deal. You won't love or hate it. It's great for shopping their souvenirs. Their T-shirts are stylish..

Title: Save your money
Review: Went for the Breakfast buffet, poor service, terrible food. With so many good little cafés don't waste your money on this place for breakfast. Enough said really,

Title: Great!
Review: Great food & great atmosphere to be enjoyed! loved our time here and will defiantly be returning. good work

Title: Rock N Roll Fever!
Review: Super cool Hard Rock Café! We waited around 45 minutes to dine for dinner. As your waiting you can walk around browse the café and store. This is by far one of my favorite Hard Rock Cafe's I have visited. Super fun and lively atmosphere.

Title: Great staff!
Review: Bar staff helped get us seated with a minor. Even asked a customer to move over for us! Everything after that was slow. Food was good as per the standard. Enjoy

Title: Great staff and food
Review: We spent the christmas eve dinner and christmas day dinner too. The staff is super nice. The portions are very generous, do not underestimate it. Also the drinks, the fruitpalooza was one of the most delicious drinks i have ever drunk.

Title: Great food, Cold Drinks, Great atmosphere (just like always)!!
Review: The price of food and drinks at Hard Rock is very reasonable especially for NYC. The bartender (during the day on Sat.) wasn't the friendliest I've had at Hard Rocks. The waiter (Rocko) at our lunch table was awesome, very accommodating and informative.

Title: Always good!
Review: Ate lunch with my family before Pinstripe Bowl game, 12/2014. Great atmosphere, food was good, wait time was set at 45 minutes, but seated after about only 25. Service was good. Great selection for kids.

Title: Excellent
Review: Nothing like a visit to a Hard Rock cafe and where better Times Square. Great fun, attentive staff. Fab food. All the stars things everywhere to be looked at, great atmosphere.

Title: Good stop.
Review: It was a great experience and food was pretty good. It was a little pricy for what you get but welcome to new york.

Title: Nice enough - no great shakes
Review: The staff are really friendly, the food is good (no more than expected) and the pricing is standard. Great atmosphere but all in all no more than expected of a hard rock.

Title: Nice place for a drink
Review: I had a couple of beers at the bar with a lil burger (1200kcal) nice music and friendly staff. Nice hard rock

Title: Nothing special
Review: Didn't notice anything special, crazy overpriced. If you're not looking for anything history special place, check out other places with better service and food.

Title: Good, not great
Review: A busy day for the cafe, too many private parties. Main dining area was slow. We got to the cafe just after 4 p.m. amen had to wait 45 minutes for a table. Server worked hard, food was tasty but warm.

Title: as like hard rock cafe
Review: food is good..with all interior really hard rock... location is superb in broadway, time square... the staff is very friendly and always help you with smile...

Title: As expected
Review: Went here for lunch while visiting time square. We've been to a couple Hard Rock restaurants and as expected, this was good. If you've never been to one I recommend it for the experience.

Title: Good Burgers
Review: Hard Rock Cafe is in times square and there is lot of customers but service is fast and burgers tasty.

Title: Standard Hard Rock fair!
Review: I've eaten at HRC in various cities around the world, and the NYC one is well, just like all the rest! Decent food with huge amounts! Same decor, just a bigger place!

Title: Standard.
Review: What you'd expect from any Hard Rock Cafe. Service and food was good. Had to sit at the bar and eat even though there were 15-20 empty tables.

Title: Its a Hard Rock.
Review: Nothing great about this place. Nothing wrong with it either. Just a plain and simple Hard Rock. I went mid-week and didn't have to queue which was a bonus. The food was good, filling as usual. Service was also fine. Just nothing wowed me.

Title: Go somewhere else
Review: First time in New York and went here. Service was appalling and food even worse.... Our burger came up still frozen in the middle. Given a $25 gift card to say sorry but this can only be used on food

Title: Fills Me Up
Review: Most Hard Rock Cafe food is the same at all locations. The menus might be a bit different, but the food is good and one thing they always do is fill up your plate, so you never leave hungry.

Title: The Legendary Burger
Review: Try one, you won't be disappointed, and the fries are delicious. One of the best burger and chip meals I've ever eaten, in a brilliant setting full of musical history.

Title: Overpriced diner food
Review: Hard Rock Café does offer a great atmosphere. If you want to just hang out with friend and not worried about the cuisine, then this is the place for you.

Title: Good food, neat interior
Review: This is one of the better Hard Rock's I've visited. With New York's rich music history, it's great to see these vintage items. The Beatles suites are here among hundreds of other props.

Title: was ok
Review: Service was ok food a bit over priced compared to other hard rock cafes but worth a visit to the shop if you collect hard rock items.

Title: Average Hard Rock Restaurant
Review: It is just like every other Hard Rock Cafe. If you've seen one, you've seen this one. Food and service were not bad but it was nothing extravagant. I would recommend going to a restaurant you can only find in NY and not a chain.

Title: Another fabulous night
Review: Had drinks and food sitting at the bar which we prefer. Great service very friendly. Thank you Josh. Great atmosphere x

Title: Hard Rock
Review: Went here with friends for a tourist experience- it was ok-service good, burgers were fine & cooked to order. Kitschy but fun.

Title: Just like every other
Review: I like the Hard Rock Cafes, this one is just like the others with all the memorabilia. It can seat a lot of people and table wait wasn't bad.

Title: Best Hard Rock you will visit
Review: Atmosphere was second to none, food was average but to be honest you go to the hard rock cafe for the experience, not the food although the bacons burger was pure class! visited with my school in febuary 2013

Title: Good food
Review: Really good burgers and they are huge! Also good music and atmosphere. Nice place for dinner or just a drink at the bar. Will go here again!

Title: Great Atmosphere
Review: We went here after seeing Chicago. The service and food was fantastic and and the look of the restraunt was amazing.

Title: another HRC
Review: well, we all know that hard rock cafe is cool. the location of the new york one is great and it is quite big. not super special but a decent cool hrc!

Title: We love the Hard Rock
Review: Terry the waiter was the best. Food was good and the drinks were cold. We had a good time. What more can you ask for? We left happy

Title: Very attentive
Review: We visited Hard rock on our last day and wish we had done so sooner. Service was excellent, food good and cocktails amazing. We will be back on our next visit to New York

Title: Amazing Waiter!
Review: Food lovely! But the waiter made the service Top notch! He was so funny and made our experience so great! He used to come from the same country as us and he knew what we were saying even with our strong accents!

Title: Good atmosphere
Review: It is your typical Hard Rock but the environment is electric. Must be the location. Service was a bit slow even at 10:30 PM. The food was great and the menu had a lot of variety.

Title: Usual Hardrock
Review: Poor service, mediocre food, place could do with a good tidy up and some sort of system would help. But it's Hard Rock so will always attract, until you get in and have to wiat for service

Title: Disappointing.
Review: Nearly empty, good service but food nothing special. Wouldn't go again. But out waiter was great, everything looked tired rather than vintage.

Title: Fantastic food with a wonderful atmosphere
Review: Thoroughly enjoyed our meal here! Burgers were all tasty. Service was great. We would all definitely return.

Title: Ok - Fair price for Times Square
Review: Service good, food ok but nothing special but then can you go wrong with a burger? On the plus side thought it was good value for money considering it was in Times Square.

Title: Fun and lively
Review: Visited twice with my husband on a recent trip to New York to celebrate our anniversary. Food was plentiful and tasty. Cocktails and wine delicious. We ate at the bar as we like a relaxed dining experience. Service was great. Would definitely return.

Title: One of the best HRC we have been to!
Review: Situated in the famous Paramount Building, HRC NYC has the original doors from Abbey Road and some lovely John Lennon pieces. Service was quick and the food was some of the best we have tasted in a HRC.

Title: Nothing special
Review: Below the shop and bar was dark,busy and service was slow. Cocktails were nice and reasonably priced.

Title: Just Amazing
Review: We visited here just because you have to. It was simply amazing with the rock memorabilia, with Billy Joel's Motorcycle the wall of guitars and such friendly staff. A must to visit.

Title: Really Nice
Review: It's like a rock museum, Nice food. It is a little expensive, though, however worth it. Very nice location, over TIme Square Garden.

Title: Breakfast buffe
Review: Nice breakfastbuffe, bacon, eggs, pancakes and The other usual stuff for about 17.99. Nothing Spectacular but totally ok!

Title: Amazing Food
Review: Visited hear at the end of Jan with my partner. No wait lots of free tables. Excellent food...hugeeee portion sizes and even bigger deserts. I'm sure if we go back to NYC we will visit again.

Title: loved it
Review: hard rock cafe located in times square so gets very busy but reasonably priced drinks and good food great atmosphere and cramed with music memorabelia

Title: Great Visit, great customer Service!
Review: I had the brisket nachos! I took the picture with the guitar. It was a good cheat meal! I check out all the Hard Rock's! I'd visit again!

Title: Hard Rock Cafe 4ever
Review: Very nice atmosphere, very good and nice staff, delicious hamburgers, good music, normally price, smoking sun. Everything was fantastic...

Title: Hard Rock is never disappointing
Review: Hard Rock is never disappointing! The best burgers and the drinks are always perfect! The staff are very friendly and always smiling, and the atmosphere is super cool :)

Title: The portions are crazy!!'
Review: I ordered nachos to start, I had to cancel the main!! The size of the plate was huge!! Nice interior and the waiting staff are lush!! Right in the middle of Times Square, so it's worth a visit!

Title: Great Atmosphere
Review: Great food and great cocktails!!portions huge! Was brilliant to get a seat in amongst the hustle and bustle of Times Square i reserved a table online before we came on holiday as its very busy.

Title: Worth a Wait
Review: We love all of the Hard Rock Cafe's. The food was good and worth the wait for NYC. Price is higher in Manhattan than our home area of Phoenix and the wait was worth the half hour time to get seated.

Title: If you have never been give it a try
Review: This is the third Hard Rock I have dined in and it is the Best of 3. Love the food, location and service... will go back next time I am in the city

Title: Purely For Tourists
Review: There's is nothing special about the overpriced food. Unfortunately, the service was dreadful. You are really paying for atmosphere.

Title: Like all the others - GREAT!
Review: Where ever you go, Hard Rock is a must on the agenda! The one in NYC is no different. Food, service & atmosphere are always great!!!

Title: Extremely busy - book in advance
Review: The queue was huge and as we only wanted a drink were able to go in although could not find a seat for love or money. Found the staff arrogant and rude and not too bothered about customer service. Disappointed

Title: yummy wings
Review: loved the wings - seasoned and not "just hot". the bruschetta was good too, large pieces of toast with a generous helping of fresh tomatoes, etc. Service was good - not too pushy, available when needed.

Title: Good food
Review: The food was good and the place was typical hard rock. The service from our hostess was not so good though, it seemed to us that she was a bit tired of her job, which made the hole experience average.

Title: Nothing special
Review: Restaurant typical of this chain. We said we needed to eat quickly as going to a show and we did! The food and service was ok

Title: Awesome BBQ Ribs
Review: Went for a late night dinner. Great service and great food. Had the onion rings as the appetizer, then the BBQ ribs which were HUGE and my husband has the hamburger which he loved.

Title: Great fun and service
Review: This was a lovely experience, very good food, service and good fun. It is very interesting with all the memorabilia and great that they took a photo of us that we could buy.

Title: Typical Hard Rock
Review: Stopped in for appetizer and drinks. Typical HR menu. Good selections. Great service from Nathaniel. He went the extra mile to help determine our rewards number do we could get credit for our visit! He pushed this rating to "very good".

Title: One of the best collection of HRs
Review: Very good, big, nice and friendly staff,spacious and good food! Recommended for all ages! There was nothing bad on my visit

Title: Hard Rock Times Square
Review: We got seated very quickly. We had the app assortment, burger & Cobb salad. Service was great. Food was what we expected.

Title: Great Service
Review: There was a 20 minute wait for a table but you can shop upstairs and walk around and see the memorabilia. The server was very helpful and attentive, even though the restaurant was very busy. The food was great!

Title: Try it once
Review: It was ok and nice to say I had been there but nothing special could get better food else where. Service was ok but not great

Title: Will not return
Review: The service and food were extremely poor. They ran out of ice while we were there. Service was slow. Shake was a WASTE of money. Very little shake or alcohol. Hamburger was average tasting. Do not waste your time here.

Title: Hamburger Heaven
Review: The hamburgers were wonderful. A wide selection. All around $ 16.00 which included fries. The decorations from so many musicians are fascinating and keep the kids busy and entertained.

Title: Lush!!
Review: Amazing food, had a great atmosphere and brilliant location, you never get tired of hard rock cafés!!

Title: Below Hard Rock standards
Review: Usually a fan of Hard Rock Cafe. This was disappointing though. Somewhat better than Oslo, but a lot worse than Orlando and others... Ok Service, ok Food, price as expected, still not hooray, will give it another chance though.

Title: Food
Review: Excellent food and a very nice place. Was overwhelmed by the whole experience. All staff made us feel very welcomed.

Title: Very Nice
Review: Had a great meal at Hard Rock NY, huge servings and very tasty although prices a bit steep. Good service with friendly staff and didn't have to wait for a table. Well worth a visit but not as good as Hard Rock in Vegas.

Title: Same Everywhere
Review: Usually this place is guaranteed good burgers for the family, but this visit was a little average. Mostly overdone and poor service due to number of guests eating.

Title: Overpriced and distinctly average
Review: Overpriced and distinctly average food only made up for by the setting and the great music mementos inside and out. Much better places than this around.

Title: excellent food and drinks
Review: Food is fantastic, we had a Combo of appetizers along with our cocktails.it was fantastic and amazing and yummy...

Title: Speedy seating & service!
Review: Following reviews posted previously we left with plenty time before our show however there was no wait at all! We were seated immediately, all the staff were polite & friendly. The food was great as at every Hard Rock Cafe we have visited!

Title: Gorgeous food and great atmosphere
Review: Brilliant service - there was a queue in which we had to wait to be seated but it was worth the wait! Not overly expensive either - but its not about price if your in new York.. its the experience :)

Title: its hard rock
Review: well Hard Rock café... had to go there... its pretty much the standart. nice people, average food, average beer, not so average prices ;)

Title: Not to be missed!
Review: Great food, service and atmosphere. Well worth a visit. Had a short wait on a Wednesday evening but it was well worth it. So glad we went.

Title: Long wait for so, so food
Review: Have been here several times, while checking out Broadway shows. Burgers and chicken sandwiches are good, but if you stray from the basics; watch out! Expect to wait, so don't go if you are in a rush or have a curtain to make.

Title: So Much Fun for Beatle and Dylan Fans
Review: Pure fun. Wonderful displays- original Beatle suits, guitar wall. Waiter great. Short wait for table. Food excellent and reasonable by New York standards. We will return.

Title: Jog it on..
Review: Just tired of this place.. It's in Dublin, vegas & New York. Time for something totally new.. Food & service can't complain but just boring now..

Title: Good lunch
Review: Both the burger, the salad, the drinks and the waiter were doing a very good job. It is not the cheapest place to eat, but you do get a lot in return, including atmosphere.

Title: Great lunch!
Review: Our first restaurant in NYC, it was a very neat place to go. In the heart of Time Square, very busy place! The food was great and the staff was very friendly!

Title: great staff awesome place
Review: Now I've have been to 4 hard rock cafe and let me say that so far I have two hard rock cafe that are my favorite and nyc is one great staff excellent food will come back again

Title: Very nice night out but a little overrated
Review: Everyone seemed to make a big fuss about the Hard Rock Cafe but I personally thought it was very average. Nice, but average. Perhaps not my scene as thoroughly enjoyed by everyone else.

Title: Great food, Great atmosphere
Review: One of the better Hard Rocks for an atmosphere, set under times square. Great food as usual, great service as usual and an all round really good dining experience just like every other hard rock!

Title: Great time
Review: My first trip to N.Y. first time eating at hard rock.steak I ordered was cooked perfect plus they had odouls

Title: Typical Hard Rock
Review: Standard Hard Rock experience. Decent food and decor. Crowded but that is to be expected given it's in Times Square and it's summer in NYC. Great if your just looking for a good chain restaurant.

Title: Reasonably priced and convenient location
Review: The food is what you would expect if you have been to a Hard Rock Cafe before. The service is good and you don't wait long for your meal to be delivered.

Title: Wonderful experience with my family
Review: Spent the day in NYC with husband and 2 kids, stopped at hard rock for a break between museums. The kids had so much fun with the eclectic ambiance and enjoyed the hustle and bustle of the restaurant. Food was good, so were the cocktails.

Title: Fun!!
Review: Had a veggie burger, very good....we waited about 40 minutes for a table, not bad on a Saturday night in New York!!! The service was excellent & so was the food!! Lots of cool stuff to look at too!!!

Title: Very accommodating!
Review: We traveled with a large high school group of 30. We had to wait a little for our reserved seating, but the service, proximity of seating, and food was still terrific.

Title: Enjoyed the Experience
Review: Friendly service, good food. Energetic atmosphere. Prices were consistent with the area. Enjoyed the decor. Restrooms were clean as was the restaurant.

Title: Average Hard Rock.
Review: Food was typical Hard Rock - usual American favorites. The Hard Rock 'store' is street level and you have to walk downstairs for restaurant seating. Very dark and dim. Good bar service. The food quality/seasoning was very good so gave high marks.

Title: Another Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Always must visit the Hard Rock Cafe they all the same and love em all great atmosphere same food great music love all serve all

Title: Just what you'd expect from any HRC
Review: Just like in any other HRC, the burgers were delicious, the cocktails rocked and the prices were reasonable given the location. I found it less noisy that the HRC of LA that we know well. The service was ok, as usual.

Title: Late Night Treat
Review: Our family went here after a Broadway show. It was nearly midnight but the place was very busy and loud. Our teenagers had steak dinners and ate everything. My daughter and I just enjoyed appetizers. It was all good and the service great.

Title: Great food, a bit noisy
Review: We've eaten in Hard Rock Cafes in London & Florida. The food is pretty much standard (great quality). The New York restaurant is particularly noisy.

Title: Great Food & Service
Review: I have never had a bad meal at a Hard Rock Cafe. We had not been to the one in NYC in years (since the old location, yes I'm old). We were not disappointed, everything was as good as any other HRC.

Title: breakfast - eat as much as you like!
Review: good selection of food including fresh pineapple, melon & bananas. cereals, bagels, toast, sausages, bacon, eggs, juices, tea and coffee. attentive and fun servers. cost $17 per person

Title: wall of guitars
Review: I always try to hit a Hard Rock Café if theirs one in the place I go to. good food. cool people, young and old. photos and rock paraphernalia were worth seeing

Title: Excellent food
Review: Our first meal experience was so great that we returned the following two days. The burgers are excellent and you have to try the onion rings.

Title: Loved it
Review: We ate at three HRC on this vacation and the Times Square location was amazing. Huge and roomy. Never been a fan of the food, but the wife and kids love it, it was good

Title: Good
Review: Right in the middle of times square had a little museum with it with some very cool stuff and the rest aunt was a good experience good food good service

Title: Good food and service
Review: Don't usually eat at chain restaurants in NYC but we were starving and we were in Times Square. The food was reasonably priced for the city and tasted great. It is a large restaurant and was not that crowded. I would return

Title: Hard Rock Cafe Rocks
Review: What a fun atmosphere in Times Square! The food was good, but this place is more about the atmosphere. The waiters are fun and the restaurant is really cool! It is a must see if you are a music fan. Teenagers will LOVE it!!!

Title: amazing place to eat
Review: went here in feb 2014 great place to eat and great atmoshere would go again no worries the food was really tasty and portions were large great value for money

Title: Great atmosphere!
Review: The ac was cold and the drinks and food very good! This is one of the coolest HRC's that we have been to! Loved the entrance and the restrooms! The salads, burgers and fries were all superb! Would definitely visit again whn in NYC!

Title: Underground!
Review: I love Hard Rock cafes! This is one is underground, Dark, nice music and great food. Staff is courteous. Loved it

Title: Great
Review: My sister and I went for a late dinner - the staff were so pleasant and friendly and the food was delicious!

Title: Times Square is BUSY
Review: This is a normal HR Café but they sell a breakfast buffet in the morning. We went to try it one morning and it was impossible as there was so many people trying to get in!

Title: great food and service
Review: a dinner for 3 may cost you 100 us or more if you have dessert.is a very cozy place.can visit with family or with couple.you can buy lots of merchandising ,but before check on the page for offers,

Title: Great surroundings
Review: Great decor all around some interesting memorabilia, good service with good food and drink although not the cheapest.

Title: Breakfast Buffet $17
Review: I'm assuming this is the one on Times Square. Recommend the breakfast buffet. All you can eat and drink for $17 including taxes and tips is good value. Good range of food.

Title: Great place to eat great atmosphere
Review: I have visited Many hard rock cafés and have to say this was one of the best iv been to atmosphere was great, food great and the cocktails alcoholic and non alcoholic were amazing can't wait to go back. Staff are really friendly and funny.

Title: Beautiful
Review: I had a barbecue pulled pork burger and it was the nicest I've ever had! Service was delightful and atmosphere was great. Can't wait to return!!

Title: Great Area, good food, good service
Review: The best review was already given when the person said it is your typical Hard Rock. Nothing More, Nothing Less. We went more for burgers than anything else. They were good...a little higher than most other Hard Rocks, but it is in Times Square...

Title: Hard Rock New York
Review: Big cafe, downstairs. Staff very nice and helpful. Son and I had lunch there. Would recommend . Brought home a few items from gift shop.

Title: brilliant
Review: Food is great, staff are friendly and helpful and the decor is amazing. Definitely worth a visit even just to see all the memorabilia around the room.

Title: One of the best.
Review: Have visited several Hard Rocks in the past this is the best we have visited. Food & service excellent (although a bit pricey due to name).

Title: Must visit for ambiance if not food :)
Review: Its right at the time sq. Lot of space. Good music, good food. Great interior, has a big guitar at the entrance. in shore, loved it.

Title: Great Burger in an iconic venue
Review: First time in New York City, stopping around the block near Times Square. My seventeen year old daughter spotted the restaurant and we visited on Tuesday. Didn't have to wait long. Great service and food. Atmosphere was buzzing and would visit again . Highly recommended.

Title: Best meal in NY!!
Review: Fab burgers and great service. Also a great place for momentoes of times gone by in the music industry. We all enjoyed the food!

Title: Perfect fish filet sandwich
Review: Visit The Hard Rock Cafe at Time Square in NY was an excellent visit. The staff was very helpfull and give me a seat at the bar. I order a Fish Filet Sandwich and it was very tasty.

Title: Usual Hard Rock Grub!
Review: Typical Hard Rock food, burgers, steaks etc, great memorabilia on the pictures and on the walls. A great place to go when in New York. A cool restaurant near to Times Square.

Title: A great place for a break
Review: Food good. Service reasonable. Environment excellent. Just don't let then sit you near the entrance door. Take a good look around to see the exhibits

Title: Great time
Review: Considerable wait for a table, but that is expected. Also had to wait quite a long time for our food, but the waitress was attentive and made sure we had drinks full while we waited. Food was pretty good- large portions served!

Title: Always a good time!
Review: I really enjoy Hard Rock in whatever city they are. On Times Square, the location is hopping. The service was great! The drinks were tasty. The food was consistent with other Hard Rock Cafe's.

Title: Another good Hard Rock Cafe
