Title: Quick, tasty, if a little pricey
Review: Great service, food good, fair to high pricing. No hosts on arrival, but great once we got in. Would recommend for family fun night out

Title: Can’t beat a Hard Rock!
Review: Everywhere we travel we go to a Hard Rock! Good food with friendly staff every time. We never waited for a table.

Title: great iconic decor and good food
Review: amazing service and really good food loved every min of it and really accommodating of my young son being it was very late in the evening, we had a nice dinner and a good look around and were seated so quickly even with NO reservation

Title: Nice decoration
Review: Good food, very good service and very nice decoration. The location ofcourse is perfect. It's a must place to visit in NY.

Title: Very friendly
Review: Staff couldn’t do enough for us, food was delicious and also the cocktails. The restaurant was very clean and the atmosphere was amazing

Title: Good food
Review: Although they have reduced the food portions it is still a good place to eat and enjoy a full evening with the family.

Title: Great casino. Young crowds
Review: Rooms are nice, food is really good. The only problem I had was that attracts a younger crowd. The location is great, next door from the ocean casino which is my pick for my age. All said I would stay there again.

Title: Fab food
Review: Went here for my partners birthday, food was amazing, service fantastic and cocktails very good! Would definitely go back!

Title: Nice ambiance
Review: I loved it. This is a very big place and took us 45 minutes to get a table. But it was worth it. Food was awesome.

Title: Good vibes!
Review: I love the vibes in this place! The service was really good! The food is awesome! I loved the pulled pork sandwich and the orange and feta side salad! Totally recommend if you love rock n roll and good food!

Title: First burger in USA = perfect burger
Review: Our first time in New York, we went to Hard Rock Cafe, order two cheeseburgers. The portion was really big, perfect taste. Good atmosphere.Highly recommend

Title: Happy with our visit!
Review: Food lush and at an affordable price. Had to wait 30 mins to be seated as it was busy but expected this. Loved the DJ and his music, put everyone in a happy mood. Very busy atmosphere and food still came out very quickly.

Title: We loved everything
Review: On a ten day trip to NY we went there for dinner for the last three days in the row. It was the best food and the prices were affordable. The environment was excellent.

Title: Cool place
Review: Very nice and cool place to visit. Good food and excellent service. Also good music they are playing in there ! Feel good! Highly recommended.

Title: great place
Review: Came here on our first night in New York. Had a great server when we got there. Had a switch out of server part way through enjoyed our first one better.

Title: As i earlier said Hard Rock is a religion
Review: And visiting the cafe in every city, a ritual. Hustle bustle of broadway, snowfall, and a birthday celebration at HRC, sets your spirits up. The staff was amazingly helpful. Foos as usual sumptuous.

Title: Busy day out and about.
Review: Decided to call in after a visit to the Empire state building. What a fabulous place. The place its self was very big but spotless . Staff very helpful and polite. Service was quick and friendly. Will definitely call back in .

Title: Turn down the AC!!!!
Review: Food and service was typical for the chain but the restaurant was FREEZING! What a waste of energy!!!!

Title: Good
Review: This Hard Rock is as good as any other Hard Rock. Staff were friendly. Food was a bit too spicy for our tastes but good. Prices as expected not over the top.

Title: Not bad
Review: Visited here with my son whilst on a break for his birthday. Prices reasonable compared to some NY prices and service was extremely good. We booked in advance so we did not have to wait. Thoroughly enjoyed. Nachos were fab.

Title: Fun Environment!
Review: My dd wanted a restaurant with lots screens and music. We chose the correct place! We quickly made an Open Table reservation and we were seated in front of the giant big screen immediately. Now, some of the videos were not good for children, but...More

Title: Mainly a good experience
Review: We had pre-booked for our daughters birthday whilst on holiday, and were warmly greeted when we arrived and my daughter was given the guitar to hold in the family pic, unfortunately the lady who showed us to our table looked and acted like she would rather have been somewhere else.  Luckily our server was great, food was good and arrived in a timely manner. Not the cheapest of places to eat, but was on a par with most other places.

Title: Good
Review: This Hard Rock is as good as any other Hard Rock. Staff were friendly. Food was a bit too spicy for our tastes but good. Prices as expected not over the top.

Title: Amazing as always!
Review: During our visit to New York we visited Hard Rock Cafe twice, on our first visit I booked prior for ‪7:30pm‬ so we did not have to queue however I heard others mention the wait was 1 hour 30 minutes if you had not booked, on our second visit we arrived ‪around 5pm‬ and there was no queue at all, we was taken straight to a table. The food is great as always, cooked to perfection and full of taste. I highly recommend the BBQ Steak burger I also highly recommended the alcoholic milkshakes

Title: One of the best HRCs in the world
Review: Good food at reasonable prices (compared to NY City standards). Very big place, we did not have to wait for a table on either of our 2 visits. We really appreciate the gluten free options, staff knows what they need to know! I may be wrong but they seem to have less veggie options than other HRCs we have visited

Title: Not bad
Review: Visited here with my son whilst on a break for his birthday. Prices reasonable compared to some NY prices and service was extremely good. We booked in advance so we did not have to wait. Thoroughly enjoyed. Nachos were fab.

Title: Good reaction against a problem
Review: I went with my daughters and due to communication problems our meal arrived with more than an hour delay. We ask some waiters but no answer. Finally the restaurant manager came to apologize and we did not pay the bill. A great answer from Hard Rock. I use to visit the restaurants around the world and always satisfy.

Title: Avoid the burgers
Review: So if I were to go again I would avoid the burgers and straight fry, the frys with cheese, bacon and spring onions are much nicer. Everyone else in the party had things other than burgers and theirs was nicer than mine. Puddings....2 between 4 would have been enough.... no breakfast tomorrow for me! Pretty cool stuff round the walls and it is worth booking in advance or you will wait in a queue. All in all good but not brilliant, also expensive, but that is New York.

Title: terrible
Review: We stopped here for quick drink or 2 while visiting NYC for the Iron Maiden concert. Very rushed and because we only wanted a drink sitting anywhere was a problem with the staff, eventually was allowed to sit at a bar at the side where we had the pleasure of sitting near a stinking waste bin. The music that was being being played was a joke considering the name of the place.We will stick to the Irish bars in the future.Rock fans need to give this a wide birth.

Title: Enjoyable experience
Review: Having booked online, we were straight away taken to our table - after the photo ($25 to keep, no thanks!)  Service was quick for a place that size and for a large Budweiser it was $7, which is a decent price for NY.  The portions were large and tasty. We gas the Combo and pork sandwich. Worth a go.

Title: Best Hard Rock
Review: I have visited a few Hard Rocks before and not too impressed but this one was very good. Some great memorabilia on display then good food and great service. Enjoyable.

Title: Excellent menu....eclectic atmosphere
Review: Excellent menu, eclectic atmosphere along with great location! I visited there with a bunch of friends and had a great time.

Title: Solid experience
Review: We spent a nice family/birthday dinner at Hard Rock. Very nice service and the food delivered at the expected level. No surprises good or bad. Good atmosphere.

Title: Great for a group visit
Review: Awesome atmosphere, great service. All the music stuff was great. The food and service were really great too.

Title: Just roght
Review: After a big disappointment in another restaurant I opted for the safe bet for a late lunch and were not disappointed. Food was great. Service prompt and attentive ambience fantastic. A pleasant surprise in time square

Title: Best Sweet Sixteen ever!
Review: My daughter and her friends took a limo into the city and would not have missed hanging out at HRC. They were even lucky enough to catch an awesome Hoobastank set! The Whiskey Bacon Jam Sliders are killer!

Title: Pleasent atmosphere
Review: Fast service and pleasant atmosphere, you would never believe that you are in Times Square, Food was served fast and to our liking,

Title: Great Food
Review: We had an hour before a show and our waitress was very helpful and efficient. The food was fast and delicious.

Title: Beatles/John Lennon fans ***must see!
Review: As any Hard Rock Cafe, the food is decent and the beer is cold. Service was pleasant. But the reason for our visit was to see the really cool Beatles and John Lennon memorabilia. A must see for any fan.

Title: GREAT.
Review: I have already been to Hard Rock in London but this one is FANTASTIC. The food was very good and the people very nice. The place is huge. I loved it.

Title: Excellent Service, Delicious Food, Huge Inside
Review: This is the best Hard Rock I have been to in my travels. Perfect location, very good staff, the good was amazing. Such fun drinks to order, with or without alcohol.

Title: Always an awesome time at the HRC in NYC
Review: My wife and I stopped in for some lunch and drinks and Raffe the bartender took great care of us. Our drinks were made just right and my burger was cooked to perfection. Bravo HRC NYC for your great service.

Title: Great steak
Review: Booked a meal in June ,live band great food great service.Great Hard Rock smack bang in Times Square.

Title: Very lively. Good times
Review: What's to say, it's a Hard Rock Cafe. Oh, wait, in NYC on Broadway. Had a blast. The "Adult" beverages were nice and COLD! Food was pretty good too. Loved the atmosphere. Staff was really friendly.

Title: Great atmosphere and food
Review: We stopped by late one night. We were taken right to at table. The food was very good and priced pretty good. More for the environment. Located right in Time Square.

Title: Great dining experience
Review: Went to the Hard Rock Cafe after a wander round Times Square. Fabulous memorabilia on show, great food, live music and exceptional service.

Title: Decent
Review: Decent food but great atmosphere. A good place to grab a bite and be entertained. My kids loved seeing the guitars and watching the music videos.

Title: New York Visit
Review: Went in for a quick breskfast, realised it was a buffet.. bonus. Pretty good food for a very limited small sized buffet. great atmosphere. excellent service.

Title: fantastic experience
Review: very friendly staff and food is excellent. Combined with the items from Rock'n Roll history exhibited made the experience a very good one.

Title: Meh
Review: The food as usual was ok. Not amazing but not awful either. The server was really nice and took their time chatting with us. Cool to see the memorabilia.

Title: Rocking
Review: As always, another HR venue to tick off, glass collection building. Great food, great atmosphere great service great location in Time sq.

Title: Wonderful
Review: We didn’t have to wait for a table. Our service was pretty good and food was great! Best burger I’ve ever had! Great atmosphere too!

Title: Good Venue
Review: A very busy restaurant so making a booking is essential. Service relatively quick considering the number of guest.

Title: Good vibes
Review: Hard Rock Coffee is cool for a drink and music. I enjoyed discovering old fashioned bass from Beatles and was full after a meal.

Title: Amazing
Review: If you are a music fan then you must visit Hard Rock Cafe this is a must do,we went there three times for brunch and it was excellent value

Title: Twice on one day!
Review: After having lunch at the Hard Rock Cafe, we also ended up at the HRC for dinner (couldn’t find an alternative around 11pm). The food, drinks and service is super. So much better than my last visit in the HRC in Brussels.

Title: Hardly cafe
Review: Stay away! Get a pretzel! We had ordered for 16 people, but ended up at five different tables. And our burgers were some of the worst I’ve ever had! No. Just no!

Title: Birthday
Review: This was my birthday treat , making memories It was a fab night with fab food with fab service what else can you ask for x

Title: good music and astmosphere
Review: Had booked before we travelled and only waited for 5 minutes to be seated. Our waitress was attentive and happy to talk and take our photos. Food was average to me but had very nice cocktail.

Title: Great burgers shame they charge to be healthier
Review: I love the burgers in Hard Rock, the only one thing I don’t like is to eat healthy I had to pay an additional $3.50 to swap out my fries for a salad wanting to eat a healthier option should not be an additional cost.

Title: Great time at the bar
Review: Waiter was so much fun - food was good also! Restaurant was packed, but we sat at the bar and had lunch. Great time!

Title: Time Square & Hard Rock
Review: Time Square & Hard Rock it is the best combinations that you must have in New York City ... is the most and amazing place to stay every time !!! 👍👍👍👍👍👍🍾🍾🍾🍾🍾

Title: One off
Review: Came here for our last meal before flying back to the u.k.It's a fantastic place if you are into music and memorabilia it might be a little pricey for what you get but for a one off visit it can't be beaten.

Title: Typical Hard Rock
Review: Always enjoy Hard Rock Cafe and this one was as good as any. Music not overly loud ~ which was good. Food as expected with portion size good. Service great. Drinks slightly overpriced.

Title: Birthday Treat
Review: Where ever we are in the world it has to be the Hard Rock,we love this place,the atmosphere,the music,the food,the shop.

Title: Great music...
Review: ...great food. We all enjoyed the California Cobb Salad for lunch before a Saturday matinee. Friendly service, attentive without being overbearing. The salad was out of this world with flavor and freshness. Nice ambience and great music.

Title: Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Really enjoyable meal! We had heard the quality could be hit or miss but couldn’t fault the food! Really recommend booking in advance (we did this the morning we were planning on going) as the wait times can be long!!

Title: Great breakfast 🍳☕
Review: Went for breakfast on my 60th birthday. What a way to start the day, all you can eat buffet, mimosas, coffee, pancakes, waffles, didn't need to eat again till night time !

Title: Enjoyable family meal. Food good and great service
Review: Family visit when it was not busy and the service was good. The food was expensive but of a high quality. It remains my childrens' favourite meal of the NYC holiday

Title: Superb
Review: This was probably the best meal we had during our stay. The Service from Luis was supberb. I have to day it was the most expensive meal we had whilst in New York but I guess you get what u pay for.

Title: Fun place to eat
Review: Hard Rock Cafe was everything I expected it to be. The food was tasty, staff friendly and they provided a good service. Certainly worth checking out if you're in the area.

Title: Fun in Times Square
Review: This is the best Hard Rock I have been to and I have visited many around the world. The dining area is very large and staff are super friendly. You need to expect a busy restaurant with a hoard of tourists.

Title: Always Fun
Review: A very nice Hard Rock Cafe location. The food and service was great. Aways like to visit Hard Rock when I can.

Title: Fabulous as always!!
Review: Loved the size of this cafe, good location, great food, space to move around the memorabilia. Will definitley be visiting again!

Title: Easy in and out
Review: Go for late lunch/early dinner. No wait at all. You will get your photo taken upon arrival so be prepared if you want to do a cool rockstar pose.

Title: A Solid Rock Experience
Review: It's cool to get to see rock icons' stuff all over the place and to enjoy a beer in the bar. Great service and comfy place. thanks, HRC.

Title: Busy Busy Busy
Review: Worth the wait, the meals are huge and the drinks too. WE skipped starters and went straight for mains and desserts. Worth every minute waiting (20mins) The service is extremely busy and still very good service. Can be noisy at times ask for quieter table.

Title: Great!
Review: Came with my partner for steaks. Steak was absolutely beautiful, fell apart as you cut it, perfection. Service great, drinks very nice, food to die for. Got our daughter a T-shirt on the way out and the man in the gift shop was very kind.

Title: Tripadvisor
Review: Well this place rocks and roll great fun food pool beer wine and more the rms r all big clean great view too

Title: Dinner for two
Review: Had to try it out whilst in USA, I would reccomend didnt manage to see any music / band whilst in here, how ever for was tastey seems to be the going rate for priced food locally worth a visit

Title: Lovely food and great experience
Review: Such a great experience and abeyance with good background music. The food was lovely and the staff were great and got some gift vouchers for the shop.

Title: Best burger ever
Review: Best burger I ever had.... Prices are too cheap. I think I will be returning. Drink prices are also average.

Title: Rock and roll
Review: Hard rock cafe is all over the world but this is the original and best one i have been to, great service ,great food and enjoyed listening to all the tunes .

Title: Best place to eat
Review: I love any hard rock cafe, this one was just as good and just looking at the building was amazing. From the outside it looks like a theatre which is amazing.

Title: Great service, good food
Review: Had a fab meal here, good food as always and exceptional service from our server Shaun. Kids loved it

Title: Fantastic
Review: What a fun delightful place, amazing decor friendly staff and lovely food, we nipped in a few times while in Times Square, food portions plenty and tasty atmosphere was fantastic

Title: great location
Review: Great location and good food NY City food is pricey, so this is too great memberlia around restaurant

Title: Great music ambience
Review: Went there a long time ago, love their nachos, it was a bit busy and took a while to be served but liked it anyway!

Title: Great food, Great atmosphere
Review: My boyfriend and I came here a few times because the food was so good and the atmosphere was electric! All the staff are very friendly and attentive to your every need. Would definately recommend!

Title: First time at Hard Rock
Review: Really enjoyed this restaurant, had the impossible burger was delicious. Loved the service and the cocktails and of course the music. Give it a go, book online before hand as it can be busy :-)

Title: Great Visit
Review: We booked to come here for lunch. The service was very good and friendly. The food was recieved pretty quickly. The food quality was very good, the meals were cooked to order and we were quite happy.

Title: Centre of Time Square
Review: Right in the centre of Times Square Had a 10 minute wait as tables were busy. Usual hard rock menu, burgers etc Felt a little rushed but food was good

Title: Great atmosphere, tasty food
Review: Fairly early dinner, so before main rush, and seated straightaway. Staff very friendly and helpful. Loved the atmosphere and the food - the fries were delicious. Opted for non-alcoholic cocktails which were superb.

Title: Great fun!
Review: Had post dinner drinks at HRC, and it is vibrant. Drinks are relatively cheap compared to the restaurants in NYC. Good place to hang out & chill.

Title: Great service again and again
Review: We have been twice at the HRC. Food was as tasty as always. Outstanding service delivered by Rafael. Thanks a lot. You are a great ambassador for the HRC New York.

Title: Very good food and service
Review: Located in a very convenient place in NYC, the food was very good and the wait staff were friendly and helpful. Awesome nachos!!

Title: Dinner in NYC
Review: We visit lots of HRC and have membership so we had a reward of entree for free. We both had the Fajitas which are delicious but a lot of food.

Title: Great food and service
Review: Food here was great matched by the service. The bbq pork burger was great as were the.nachos. loved the experience.

Title: Great fun venue
Review: We arrived, got what we intended, paid and left, quick easy pleasant and not too expensive. When there's so much to see there's no time for eating haha

Title: Good food
Review: Visited twice during our 4 night stay as hotel is close to Times Square. Can be expensive but go early and you then do not have to queue for a seat

Title: Always visit a Hard Rock when we travel
Review: Visited this branch on our recent visit. Bigger louder and busier than other recent visits Best service of any of the recent branches we have visited our server was amazing...so friendly and food and drinks were prompt, hot and tasty

Title: lovely food
Review: great place, staff friendly and efficient and the food is excellent, Brilliant atmosphere. We had a photo taken which if you want is added to the bill and it was still cheaper than other places we had eaten - great

Title: Great Hard Rock
Review: I have been to six Hard Rocks and this is by far the best. While crowded, as expected, they were efficient in getting patrons in and out. The food was outstanding and better than you would expect. Well kept and clean setting.

Title: What’s not to like!
Review: Had a really lovely meal, staff were excellent & professional & didn’t wait long for the table or the food to arrive.

Title: Good food and service
Review: Great food and great service. Went on Friday night and didn't have to wait for a seat. Great atmosphere and good music on. $15 for a beer but you get to keep the glass!

Title: They will rock you!
Review: It's New York, it's the Hard Rock Cafe, it;'s bold, brash, loud and what most of the customers want it to be. Food is average but that's not what they come for, the experience, the rush is all there - rock on!

Title: Good visit!
Review: I like Hard Rock Cafe all over the world, so the visit was great again. Good burgers, Long Island Ice Tea and service.

Title: A dream come true
Review: How could a rock fan be in New York and not visit the HRC?! For us, it was a dream come true to see the all the displays in person. That was food enough for our souls!

Title: Just a quick drink but a fun place to see
Review: We didn't eat here, but the vibe is cool, decor is great with so much nostalgia. Sat in the bar and it is loud, but hey, it is NYC!

Title: Hard to resist!
Review: Great menu with a good choice of dishes. Reasonably priced for New York. Great service. Lots of memorabilia and of course the Hard Rock shop.

Title: First time New York
Review: Excellent evening atmosphere brilliant Service excellent as experienced in other restaurants food and drinks expensive but as we soon found out that's New York

Title: Great burgers Legendary!
Review: Perfectly located HRC in New York. Amazing interiors and like everywhere perfect burgers. Staff bery friendly. So it is great place for burgers and some drinks.

Title: Another great evening
Review: We always hit a hard rock when we are away this trip was no exception. Plenty to drink and eat whilst listening to good music. We had to sit at the bar as it was so busy. But well worth it.

Title: Not a bad breakfast.
Review: First morning in NYC we decided to go here for breakfast. Food was nice. A little expensive & service was slow but the staff were friendly & helpful. Good pancakes!

Title: Amazing!
Review: When it is about Hard Rock, is always a good idea and even better when it’s situated in New York! We had an awesome time there, full of amazing music and delicious food. Can’t wait to come back!

Title: Usual HRC fare
Review: If you've been to one Hard Rock Café then you now the menu. This one is pretty big and serves up the same food. Enjoyed our visits.

Title: not as used to be.. same old food and bad staff
Review: I think this is the works Hard Rock Cafe... the facilities are so dark and dirty.. staff aiming for you to leave and the food is the same as ever. Do not recommend it.

Title: The best service we received in New York!
Review: We had a great evening at this restaurant celebrating Mum’s 50th Birthday. There was 12 of us and our waitress Amanda was so lovely and friendly and provided a faultless service, so thank you Amanda :)

Title: Girls weekend in NYC
Review: Great service, Great food. Didnt have to wait long for our table and we went on a friday night at 5pm. Drinks were great. Our waitress was amazing. food was delicous.

Title: Love the vibe
Review: This place really transports you to your own world of rock and roll, take me back anytime. This is such a tourist trap, but they are a quality restaurant despite

Title: Dinner at HRC New York
Review: HRC is one of my favorite places. This location provided great food, great service and is nicely located. Waiting time was over an hour but the experience compensated the waiting time.

Title: Great food
Review: Arrived around 10:30pm after a full day at niagra falls. We were seated immediately and had wonderful service throughout. We ordered a burger meal between us as portions are large. Food was fabulous as ever

Title: good for a quick bite
Review: service was fast. food was okay. didn't like the fact that the restaurant was in the basement, however I had limited time to get a bite to eat so I ended up here. it okay. nothing fancy

Title: good food
Review: had food here on a very busy saturday evening in september. Got seated alot quicker than we got told which was a bonus. The food was very good also.

Title: Wonderful Time
Review: We stopped in for a brew and nachos and rest. Place was fun, great service. Great nachos. Gift shop is spectacular, bought alot of shirts, and stuff. Went back again. Gift shop staff were fun and attentive.

Title: Poor and overrated.
Review: Little atmosphere and overpriced food and drink. The black bean and quinoa burger was disgusting - they really should come up with a DECENT vegetarian option. Good service. London is a much better venue

Title: waste of money
Review: I really do not underdtand people who like these place ( I know many ) and are happy to buy a 3 usd shirt for 30 bucks just for the logo ! absolute crazyness the food is not gret but not so bad too

Title: Nothing special
Review: Nice ribs, steak was very dry (ordered medium but the one we got was more well done) service is very hostipale. Pricing OK.

Title: Brilliant
Review: Greta food and overall awesome experience at the New York hard rock. This is a very busy hard rock and although had to wait to sit down it was well worth the wait

Title: Shopping original "Hard rock cafe" products is perfect
Review: You can shop very nice original products manufactured for "Hard Rock Cafe".Very crowd shop but you can find everything you want.Nice to watch,nice to shop.

Title: Fab burgers!
Review: A fun place to visit. Lots of cool memorabilia and great music. The portions are big. The nachos were great. Friendly service. Quite expensive but it is Times Square after all.

Title: Love it!
Review: A HRC rarely disappoints me. This is one of the greatest I have been. Great memorabilia, plus they serve my favorite bbq chicken wings in the whole world.

Title: Ehhh
Review: It was ok. The food was mediocre. The only part of the good I liked was the burger. The place was cool though. A little on the expensive side.

Title: Lovely meal
Review: We had a lovely meal here we waited about 25 minutes to be seated. We were served by Monica who was lovely she explain the menu and was really on the ball with serving everyone. The pull pork burger is highly recommended.

Title: Perfect
Review: I visited Hard Rock Cafe NYC on my birthday so it good music, reasonable price. I will come again. Let come and enjoy

Title: Excellent Venue
Review: Called in for lunch, friendly, efficient and professional staff, speedy service with a smile, comfortable seating and excellent food.

Title: Family visit
Review: Great service. Wonderful food! Out of town family sightseeing in the city. Great place for lunch, staff even led a chorus of Happy Birthday and brought out a "Birthday Sundae".

Title: Perfect !
Review: We visited Hard Rock Cafe in January so it was not very chaotic. Very good music ,the staff was very friendly and attentive, very good variety of drinks. Worth the visit 10000%,Would come again for sure!!!!!!!!!!!

Title: I come back
Review: Always good come back in a great place... After some time, I went back to Hard Rock Cafe NYC, wonderful place with best burgger and great services... Go there and enjoy

Title: Great visit
Review: As always with hard rocks - great service and food - couldn't fault - didn't book but turned up and advised needed to wait for table but was only short time - great staff

Title: A meat lovers dream.
Review: The food is great and the waiters are terrific. Prices are great too! Our family choices ranged from salmon to steak to fajitas to burgers.

Title: Little bizarre
Review: Food was really good, server was awesome. For Nashville it was kind of bland and weird. Not a ton of stuff on the walls. The music video TVs where kind of annoying

Title: Great Burgers
Review: Really enjoyed Hard Rock cafe New York. Food and drinks were reasonably priced in comparison to other similar restaurants on New York. Food was a good quality, yummy burger! Kids menus were great and service was good too. Would definately recommend.

Title: Best Hard Rock Cafe we have been to
Review: This Hard Rock Café is just huge with the most amazing collection of memorabilia that we have ever seen. Add to that great food and good service with fair prices, what else would you need?

Title: You need to see this one
Review: You need to see this one. You have to see this once because you love rock or because you want to look inside. Original object and photos can be seen on the walls about lengendary musicians.

Title: nice meal and visit
Review: This is a very busy multi level restaurant. We were greeted in a timely fashion and seated after a very short wait. The meal was nicely served and pleantyful. Reasonably priced for New York.

Title: Lovely place for a fun group meal!
Review: Resturant lived up to the good reputations that HRCs have - staff were engaging and delightful. The food was of a good standard, with interesting options available to order. Well worth the visit, looking forward to the next one!

Title: Not as good as expected
Review: Food basic & expensive . Staff welcoming & good service but food a let down , my ribs was luke warm . Would not return

Title: Great Customer Service
Review: We stopped in the Hard Rock Cafe gift shop for some souvenirs while visiting NYC. We didn't eat the food here, so I can't comment on it. We did, however, buy merchandise and the folks working in the gift shop were friendly and helpful.

Title: Terrible
Review: They need to hire front door/host desk staff that have manners and are trained to be customer friendly. Deplorable.

Title: Food mediocre, scruffy surroundings
Review: Sticky tablecloth, no atmosphere, veggie burger wasn't nice, quite expensive for the quality of the food.

Title: Perfect with kids
Review: We stopped here with two young kids after visiting Times Square and it was a perfect little hideout with food the kids loved. Definitely a great stop to get out of the heat.

Title: Great location in Times Square. Quick service
Review: Hard Rock is right in Times Square. The staff is nice. Food was average/acceptable/expensive as expected. the Hard Rock store of souvenirs in right inside.

Title: Excellent as always
Review: Great food, excellent atmosphere, very busy but the that added to the vibe. The service was good considering how busy it was. The fact it was in time square was a bonus. Another hard rock ticket off the list 👌

Title: Great atmosphere
Review: Hard Rock has a great atmosphere with great food and great service. Our waiter who was called Timothy was fantastic he genuinely made us feel valued and couldn't do enough for us, checking regularly that our food and everything was ok.

Title: Bar food is good
Review: Dropped in here after a days sight-seeing. Had food and a few drinks at the bar because it was busy. Similar to other HR's I've been to, didn't disappoint.

Title: Average at best
Review: Food was average, decor was average, service was average. Nothing special. No different than any other Hard Rock Cafe

Title: Great food
Review: Long wait for table so ordered at the bar. Chicken Caesar salad was delish with plenty of chicken. Two pulled pork burgers were fab, couldn't finish them. Drinks were nice and cold, perfect. Prices are typical NYC.

Title: Great Burgers
Review: Burgers and music, that's what you want from Hard Rock Cafe. Both meat and vegetarian burgers were exquisite. Place can get crowded but it is not that noticeable when you are having a good time.

Title: Inconsistent
Review: Went twice first was really good and the waitress that had just moved from Washington was brilliant. Next visit cold food terrible staff and I'm sorry but the Mexican staff need to go on customer service course

Title: Pam Peterson
Review: OMG if you go to Time Square you have to go to Hard Rock the food was amazing the atmosphere was super,the staff were excellent a must go to.

Title: Amazing and wonderful place!
Review: Eating here in New York, at Time Square...in this wonderful place...it has been great! Delicious food (special advice for hamburgers and mix of appetizers!!!), beautiful and very very good cocktails, kindness... our favorite place to eat in Manhattan! Try it soon!

Title: Met our needs , but nothing special
Review: Our daughter has allergies and the could accommodate us. The waitress was nice and the food came quickly, but it was nothing special!

Title: Always a good time and good food
Review: We took our kids here on a school trip to NYC. They were really taken in by the memorabilia. The service and food is quite good. The staff is efficient and all 50 of us were served without much delay.

Title: Standard hard rock cafe
Review: Usual hard rock cafe. They had a veggie burger which i'd not seen elsewhere before. Food was pretty good.

Title: Spot on
Review: Dropped in for a pint and a break from the sun. The bar is underground and when you are in there it’s perfectly air conditioned, great bar staff were very friendly also

Title: Rock On!
Review: I travel a lot and if there's a HR nearby I'm there. This is a GREAT one! And what a great location in Times Square. Highly recommended!

Title: Great food and service
Review: Had a great experience here. The food was 10/10. The service off Delilah was amazing. The atmosphere great. Good music and not over priced compared with the rest of NYC.

Title: Nice Evening
Review: Booked here and went in on time , had to have a photo with a guitar before going to restaurant which i'm not sure about , food lovely , staff pleasant and great atmosphere - worth a visit.

Title: After the Broadway Show
Review: Great end to the day on Broadway seeing Chicago and now this.. Atmosphere, drinks, dinner, dessert, all good!!! Highly recommend!

Title: Rocking!!!
Review: Great location, very friendly staff, good food, beverages and service. The cheeseburger, fries and Hurricane were really good!

Title: Great
Review: Lovely food reasonable price great atmosphere. Wide range of food to suit all tastes. Huge range of cocktails and drinks

Title: Good experience
Review: We visited here for some late night food whilst in NYC and enjoyed our experience. The food was great, the portions generous and the staff friendly. Location is also excellent, would go back if in town again.

Title: Fantastic food and surroundings.....
Review: This a great place for dinner, food was really good and the restaurant itself is very impressive, fantastic atmosphere and perfect for families

Title: Fab Hard Rock
Review: First visit for me. Amazing Hard Rock. Great service. The wall of 300 guitars is fab. Good selection of memorabilia including heavy metal which is quite rare in the other Hard Rocks I’ve been!

Title: Great experience
Review: The food is reasonable priced for NYC, waiter was very good and pleasant and the Burgers excellent. Very quick service so take some time between ordering your dessert otherwise you will feel that you are being rushed.

Title: Enjoyable experience
Review: Reasonably priced, waiter very pleasant. Food came really fast- no time in between courses.Try the Jumbo Combo dessert- delicious!!!

Title: fun
Review: had a late late dinner at the hard rock...it's always fun and playing great music...food was good...it's fun to go to...

Title: A must do in New York
Review: Great place to take teenagers with excellent mixed music and a bit of theatre. Family friendly food but personally disappointed that there wasn't a vegan choice, not even soya or almond milk for a coffee. Average service with a higher than average price tag.

Title: Cool Place
Review: Just like Planet Hollywood, overrated and overpriced. Can't go wrong with wings and burgers. The memorabilia is very cool.

Title: I love this Hard Rock
Review: I love this Hard Rock right in Times Square. It does not participate in the Hard Rock Rewards program, but it is still a great place. Love the cauliflower wings.

Title: Good food
Review: Good food, great service, competitive prices for similar restaurants. We jumped the queue as I had an online reservation booked. Worth a visit! My second visit in 18 months!

Title: Quality Service, Awesome Burgers, Good Music
Review: 3rd Hard Rock Cafe I’ve visited and service was excellent as always and the food delicious! Would recommend the local legend burger and drinks wise the air Mexico 👍 would advise booking or expect to wait a while for a table!

Title: Really good food, so much fun
Review: The menu is not large, but the food is really good, presented very creatively, large portions, very good service. Unfortunately I was so full I couldn't eat desert.

Title: Loved our experience-Handled a group of 200+ students with no problem
Review: Loved our experience at HRC in Times Square. Food came out hot and the staff handled a group of 200+ high school students with ease. DJ had some great tunes playing and the kids had a blast! Loved it...

Title: Fun experience
Review: Service and experience were fun! Worth the visit. Food was just okay, but that is to be expected when ordering from the "large group" menu. I would go again.

Title: Great as per usual
Review: As per usual, this HRC offers a great variety of good food, attentive staff en good atmosphere. As a frequent HRC visitor I enjoyed my visit here. As always the fajitas here are amazing, as were the burgers.

Title: O.K.
Review: Big group, limited menu. Our water was awesome and worked his butt off. Chad? The food was good and the cookies were saved for later. Thanks for dinner!

Title: So much fun!
Review: Went with my two guy friends! We were seated right away and the food was fantastic. I had an amazing pulled pork sandwich!

Title: Unexpectedly average for a Hard Rock
Review: Unfortunately our visit to the Time Square Hard Rock didn’t hit all the right notes... very rude staff, rescued by good food.

Title: Good service, Good food, Good atmosphere . . . but book up in advance or be disappointed.
Review: Good service, Good food, Good atmosphere . . . but book up in advance or be disappointed as the queue can be quote long and you may not get a table.

Title: You must Go..
Review: Traditional bar and a must see. I liked the environment, with many objects of singers and consecrated bands. Worth going to. Bar tradicional e imperdível. Gostei do ambiente, com inúmeros objetos de cantores e bandas consagradas. Vale a pena ir.

Title: Anniversary meal
Review: Fab atmosphere fab staff and fab food . Would definitely recommend this place to relax and eat . Worth a vist

Title: The best Hard Rock Cafe !!!
Review: Very nice place with a lot of pictures, clothes and guitars mainly of the biggest starts of the world wide music. Fair prices and good american food. I enjoyed so much my lunch there.

Title: Girls night out
Review: Drinks were great! Food was delicious! Our server was amazing! However, they couldn’t get their act together to sit us!! Plenty of tables around and we just got shuffled around until we ended at the bar; had to have our dinner standing up.

Title: Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Staff were friendly and couldn’t do enough to help nothing was too much trouble . Food was amazing and loads of it well price for such a well know restaurant chain . Really enough the time there well worth going .

Title: Alway good
Review: We decided to beat the crowds and had lunch at 11. Restaurant was almost empty but was filling up as we ate. Service was good. Food was very good.

Title: Disinterested staff
Review: Waited at fairly empty bar to be served. After waiting over five minutes while bar staff chatted to a customer. Gave up and left

Title: Amazing staff & music
Review: Amazing staff & music, Food was good too, great Location. If you are a smoker, you have to go upstairs on the street to smoke, but staff is helpfull :)

Title: Go here over and over again
Review: Hard Rock is just so awesome. Service was great and food was just so delicious. Burgers were so tasty! Gift shop is a bit pricey but the clothing looks nice.

Title: First time at HRC
Review: First experience of a Hard Rock Cafe. Good choice of food and drink and service was efficient. Would definitely visit again in the future. Enjoyable visit!

Title: Poor service and food
Review: The kids were excited about visiting Hard Rock in New York. The experience wasn't good. Staff were unpleasant and the food was the worst we had in North America. Planet Hollywood was so much better.

Title: Burger at the Hard Rock New York
Review: Good food and good service late at night (we arrived at around 11:00 p.m cold, tired and hungry. A bit pricey for a burger but hey, we were on holiday.

Title: Great experience
Review: Great food, good service and reasonably priced! Can recommend the potato skins for a starter and burger for main, staff were friendly and helpful too

Title: Loved it 😀
Review: We had a Legend burger, Fajitas and cocktails all very nice and all the staff very friendly be prepared to wait for a table as can be manic but worth it.

Title: Awful food
Review: Food was absolutely awful! Tasted like it had been heated in the microwave. Service was slow on a not so busy night. Definitely not worth a visit

Title: Classic good
Review: Live the Hard Rock Cafe. They do the best nachos!!! And this trip, I actually think I had one of the best steaks I have ever had! Great service, great food, great cocktails, slightly overpriced, but you’re paying for the hard rock experience!

Title: Nice experience
Review: Visited HRC with my daughter a few times during week stay in NY. Food was all right. Service was great.The music, as in most hard rock café's throughout the world was great.

Title: Restaurant was huge!
Review: We thought it might be busy so tried to book a table online but none were available, so thought we’d just try our luck and turn up. We were seated straight away, service was excellent, food was great and cocktails very tasty!

Title: Overall Nice Experience
Review: We entered and at first we didn't understand which way to go, but once we figured that out, we met a good server/ bar tender. He made us great cocktails, good quantity. Portions of food was also good! Great music and amazing decor

Title: In the heart of Times Square
Review: Good food and friendly service but overpriced. The place is very dark too. Overall though it is one of these places where one needs to go when in NYC.

Title: lovely
Review: lovely staff, great atmosphere, great food went here first night felt very comfortable, good background music

Title: I always love the Hard Rock. It Rocks Hard
Review: Yes I said the joke of my title when I was there. Yes it made me laugh...Anywho I always enjoy the Hard Rock and places like this. You know what your getting when you eat here. Music and atmosphere was allot of fun as well.

Title: Dinner!
Review: Lovely food with high quality. Workers very nice and friendly added pictures of food. Not the cheapest but the best burgers in NYC

Title: Over priced
Review: $170 for 2 starters, 3 burgers and a couple of drinks.....terrible music. The waitress was attentive but I think that was all the place had going for it. It trades on its name so inflated prices

Title: Daughter loved it!
Review: Brought my daughter here. She was performing on Broadway that weekend and entertainment is her blood. Naturally we had to bring her here. She loved it. Good service good food great experience. A must visit when seeing NYC.

Title: As always.. amazing service
Review: Every country we visit me and my boyfriend always make sure we visit a hard rock cafe! New york hard rock cafe has amazing service from all the staff, great atmosphere, overall amazing. Always a pleasure visiting! And will continue to do so!

Title: Nice Meal
Review: Standard Hard Rock Cafe. Good food and good service you'd expect. Restaurant and menu very good, service friendly and attentive. Rock memorabilia here probably better then most. Recommend as a reliable restaurant but nothing out of the world.

Title: average food- below average music
Review: The salad was dry and tasteless. The burgers were good but overpriced. The song selection was awful, such as Britney Sears and Helena Gomez, and inappropriate.

Title: Every time we are in New York we visit HardRock
Review: 30 Minutes waiting time and as every time - super service very good cocktails and delicious burger (original legendary burger) We‘ll be back next time :-)

Title: a must see
Review: Coffee or drinks in bar really good. Souvenirs are a must. I love this place, so much when in twice.

Title: Enjoyed Our Dinner
Review: Arrived late and this restaurant was close to our hotel. Food was good, our server was incredible giving us numerous ideas on how to tackle NYC.

Title: Great food
Review: An obvious place to try in New York the food was good sized. Lil bit expensive but what would one expect for a tourist

Title: Wow cafe....
Review: Hard Rock cafe, beautiful building in a best The hard Rock cafe is more attractive for the outside visiters because such a beautiful place is that., best and tasty dishes, we all like the

Title: Pretty good for a chain
Review: Never my 1st choice, however after the hockey at the Gardens, and a few beers in, this was open so we went in. Really cannot complain at all. 4 Burgers all cooked well to order. Good fries, good service, decent beer and reasonable price.

Title: We waited for an hour to be seated, but I didn't care I wanted to eat there and I was not disappointed.
Review: The wait was over an hour, but the food was wonderful and the staf were the best I didn't mind waiting because of the customer service that the staf shown me and the food too.

Title: Great ambience in great location.
Review: Enjoyable family meal whilst sightseeing in NYC. Loved the rock memorabilia. Friendly service but very busy as expected.

Title: Store and restaurant
Review: Lots of products to sell from Hard Rock Cafe items and a great collection of memories items like guitars and stuff. With restaurant (always full)

Title: As expected
Review: It was not very crowded when we went for lunch and we were seated promptly. The service was quick and efficient and the food was good as expected. Nothing extraordinary.

Title: average food
Review: Ok food if you like a burger and fries. Crowded and noisy atmosphere, but to be expected in Times Square.

Title: Outstanding service
Review: High quality service. Food was as expected - plain but reliable. Wonderful to look at the wealth of memorabilia around the restaurant, but uncomfortable at times due to the location of tables with diners seated.

Title: Excelent
Review: Eat lunchtime. We were sat down immediately in the front window so we had a great view for people watching. The guy that looked after us was excellent. Very cheerful and helpful and the ribs were delicious.

Title: Yummy breakfast
Review: I always seek out Hard Rock Cafe wherever I go the food is always good and I just love the t shirts this time I went for the buffett breakfast and at 19$ it's real value for money,

Title: Great service
Review: Considering the size of this restaurant the service was excellent. Can recommend the cocktails too. We had burgers & they were amazing

Title: One of the best
Review: One of the best Hard Rocks. Long wait but efficient service. Good menu as always and a buzzing atmosphere.

Title: Excellent lunch
Review: Decided to eat here before heading off to JFK. Service was prompt and the food was hot and tasty. Portions are very generous. Music could be more rock rather than pop. Hope all goes well for our waitress Romel and her new baby.

Title: Awful-awful-awful.
Review: Went for lunch, not for the first time here, it will be the last though. The main courses were served when we’d barely started the starters....and the old Veggie burger has been replaced by an inedible cauliflower burger. Simply dreadful.

Title: Great atmosphere
Review: Hard rock is standard usually from one city to another. Food was average but good. Great place but was super busy. Ask for a table n at the bar instead of waiting for some time for a table!

Title: Decent but nothing great
Review: I'm a hard rock fan but this place is crowded and really not worth it. There are probably better places in the vicinity with better food. Not saying its bad, but just not mind blowing or anything.

Title: Vreat food, great atmosphere
Review: first place we ate in the big apple. Good burgers and ribs. Good cocktails. on the pricey side but the atmosphere is electric and to be expected in NYC.

Title: Good as usual
Review: Good as usual. Great fajitas and salads. Friendly staff. The nicest Hard Rock in the heart of Times Square. Amazing memorabilia. Oreo cheesecake not to miss!

Title: Good atmospher
Review: Very friendly staff and good experience they had some cool items on display which is worth seeing. Service was quick and we didn't have to book.

Title: Not Bad for a Tourist Trap
Review: While walking around Times Square and in the mood for some food, stop by the Hard Rock and have a good burger surrounded with music and memorabilia.

Title: You Were AMAZING
Review: Had a wonderful evening. Tarrie the retail manager was awesome. Very friendly & a great sense of humor. This place is ROCKING!!!!

Title: Reasonable buffet breakfast
Review: Good choice of freshly cooked food plus fresh French toast, waffles or pancakes brought to your table. Selection of pastries too. Mimosa was a nice touch to set us up for the day.

Title: Iconic
Review: Amazing food, reasonable prices for a prime spot, really friendly staff. Over the course of a week we found ourselves in here a lot just for drinks etc because the atmosphere is great. Definitely worth the visit.

Title: Miserable bar staff!
Review: Visited here for a drink in the bar, told no tables free, yet loads empty and not reserved. The barman was very miserable while serving us a beer and cocktail! But have to say the cocktail did taste good so not all bad!

Title: Average diner
Review: Went to take a vacant table for two only to be ushered into another dining area. Waiter took what seamed like ages to serve our drinks and the same when I asked for the bill.

Title: Loved it!
Review: Delicious food and drink, great atmosphere and faultless service! Will definitely be visiting again!

Title: To much
Review: We stopped in after a Broadway show and it was crazy. Loud vulgar music, couldn't even take to each other. Ordered a brownie and apple crisp and they each could serve 3 people. I hate wasting food. Anyway not a pleasant experience.

Title: Group booking
Review: Ate here with a school group. Waited a little while to be seated but were quickly served. We chose burgers and chicken fillet burgers. All were good and went down well. Staff efficient and friendly. Noisy and busy. Think choices good.

Title: A warm welcome and a great team
Review: We came we ate, we were welcomed, satisfied and had great fun. Who could ask for more! No really it’s honestly that good.

Title: Fun Place
Review: We stopped by for 2 drinks and 2 appetizers one night. At $68, it wasn't exactly cheap...but it was a fun atmosphere and right in the middle of all the action. Noisy but the food was good.

Title: Great place!
Review: We had great burgers and as good fries as there are on the planet! Excellent! Be sure to wash your hands first, and after--it's a very tactile experience! (They could leave the lettuce out, it just makes things slide around.) Glad to have experienced it!

Title: Solid drinks great atmosphere
Review: What dan I say it’s the hard rock and had to get my 31st different shooter! Great either brick drinks and a fabulous atmosphere. #loveallserveall

Title: Rude Staff
Review: Stopped in as we always visit the Hard Rock wherever we are in the world.. Was greeted by a really rude waitress who had no interest in being kind or helpful. We left and took our custom elsewhere.

Title: Great food
Review: We tried the New York Strip which was beautifully cooked. The staff were friendly and very helpful. The decor was the usual memorabilia you expect at HRC. Good quality food and overall experience.

Title: Great decor/memorabilia displays
Review: If you enjoy the Hard Rock experience this is a decent one - lots of history/memorabilia to explore. Beyond that - Prices are high. Service is SLOW. Food quality is not good.

Title: Nice Experiance
Review: Great place with a lot of memorabilia, Always seem to be crowded at Dinner time. Great food & drinks. Good portions.

Title: Gift Store
Review: While in NYC we stopped by the Hard Rock Cafe Gift store in Times Square. The employees were very helpful and nice. Got a cool shirt for my collection of Hard Rock t shirts.

Title: Great food as always
Review: This cafe is smack bang in the middle of Times Square and you know that your going to get great food. They did not disappoint, great atmosphere and a legendary burger to die for!

Title: A must for lunch or dinner
Review: Service was excellent. Couldn't fault it at all. Our server was always there and making sure we were ok. Food was good. Price is kind of what you expect.

Title: Went to the time square location for a company event
Review: Went to this location for a company event and can't wait to go back with my kids. I did not pay for my meal but the ambiance and decor on the wall is well worth the visit even to visit the gift shop..

Title: Large Venue with Nice Food
Review: We have been to many Hard Rock Cafes but this is the biggest by far. We had a nice meal and I was surprised by how good it was. The server was very good also.

Title: Always Fun at Hard Rock
Review: Enjoyed lunch at Hard Rock Cafe. Good food and fast service. This location has an excellent store for shopping.

Title: Rockin' Good Burgers!
Review: What?! It's The HardRock! Get a burger and onion rings (done perfectly). Delish! Friendly wait staff - good tunes. Cool Rock - n - Roll Artifacts. Plan at least one meal here.

Title: Great Hamburgers
Review: Ordered the hamburger with cheese,lettuce, onion, BBQ sauce, along with a house salad. They both was delicious and very filling

Title: Great lunch
Review: Great lunch, great food, service was great. Atmosphere was also perfect, this is a must visit when in New York!

Title: Brilliant
Review: Up to the usual Hard Rock Cafe standard. Staff were polite and helpful. In NY? got to have their NY steak, it was lovely washed down with a couple of cocktails, great.

Title: Very interesting place
Review: Enjoy a great American Style dinner while listening to music. There are lots of Instruments, mostly electric guitars which belonged to famous rock and roll musicians or singers

Title: wonderful
Review: very good food and very good ambiance. it is guaranteed that you will have a nice ambiance as well. very satisfied

Title: good food
Review: Loved the experience here. Staff were so friendly and the food was good and served quickly. Highly recommend for a nice evening out

Title: Rubbish food and service
Review: Take my advice and do not visit this venue. It is without a doubt The worst Hard Rock I have been to around the world. If you want bad food at a very expensive price then you will be fine. It is rubbish.

Title: Best Hard Rock Yet!
Review: Having visited numerous Hard Rocks over Europe and America, I can easily say that the New York Hard Rock beats all I have been too. The staff are all polite and treat every customer with respect. I would highly recommend visiting while in New York.

Title: Fun Atmosphere
Review: Lots of cool music memorabilia throughout the restaurant. Meal and drinks were good. Ordered a couple of their signature drinks with the souvenir glasses.

Title: Great location
Review: We had Christmas dinner here last year - kid's choice - and it was very good. Luckily we had booked as there were long queues of people trying to get in. Great service, lovely food and all enjoyed the experience. Would recommend.

Title: Great food....great atmosphere.
Review: Totally enjoyed the place with its great food....great prices and great location in N Y .. Staff were attentive and food God quality. We found it a great stop off as we walked around times square and did the big bus thing for the day.

Title: Walk in
Review: Walked in with a request for a table of 7. Lovely front of house, table located, food devoured and service attentive. You know what you are going to get and it didn't disappoint

Title: Classic HRC
Review: Consistent HRC menu, prep. Great location. Staff nice, attentive. Don't be in a rush if want to wonder/browse the displays.

Title: great ribs!!!!!
Review: ribs were awesome..and a huge portion as ell. Loved the decor of all the hanging guitars and large poster size pics of many musicians

Title: Lunch was fun
Review: No line to get a table about 2pm. Tables were full when we left tho. Food was ok. Really went for the atmosphere. Music. Videos. Memorabilia. Kids liked the shop.

Title: Super Food and Atmosphere
Review: The best food, the best drink and superb Atmosphere. Would definitely visit again and would recommend to friends.

Title: Basic
Review: Food wasn't too great but waitress was very nice. The music displays were cool to see but we wouldn't go back.

Title: Great vibe and ribs!
Review: Has a great vibe and the ribs were awesome,service was good and prices were very fair,I would return

Title: Excellent food, nice decor
Review: Excellent food, we did not have to wait for long although we were 11 persons on a Friday night. Very nice decoration as well.

Title: Great Food - Great Service - Great Fun
Review: We love the Hard Rock Cafe and visit it whenever we're in NYC. The staff was friendly, and the food was as expected. Thanks for another great experience.

Title: Good experience
Review: We do like a Hard Rock and the one in Times Sq is probably the best we have eaten in. Both food and service was good, just not quite excellent.

Title: Great experience
Review: From entering a hub of excitement and music, to the excellent staff and finally amazing food, it was the one place where we thought the staff deserved a gratuity instead of expecting one

Title: Love hard rock!
Review: We visit hard rock in whichever city we go. Love the atmosphere and food. Although a little pricey we totally think it's worth it. For a relaxed and fun atmosphere it's definitely a place to go!

Title: Very Touristy - but good if that is what you like
Review: We had a decent meal here. It was VERY loud on the inside because it was crowded - which is great for the restaurant. Our food was ok but our server was great!

Title: As usual very noisy , yes it is part of the concept, excellent service and average food.
Review: As an experience for something else in dining... It is worth it! Most of the time just share it in family and birthday parties!

Title: Great restaurant at Times Square
Review: With a great atmosphere, excellent food and service, the Hard Rock Cafe at Times Square is an excellent choice.

Title: Excellent
Review: Excellent service and great moments spend with my family in this restaurant. Next time in NY will be back.

Title: Great service by Janette !
Review: Busy place, but good service from Janette, whom we discussed antiques with. Nice food and good memorbilla that covers the walls. Drinks were reasonable, it warmed us from the snow.

Title: In the Heart of Time Square
Review: We had a long wait and there was quite a crowd inside the restaurant. The wait staff was very busy and had a difficult time keeping up with customers, making several small mistakes. The food was average and prices high.

Title: A must for music lovers
Review: The musical memorabilia collection is second to none, great gift shop, with a huge restaurant, can only imagine how cool the place would be if you made it there when there is a live act on the stage.

Title: Awesome
Review: We had a superb Lunch at Hard Rock Newyork. Service was great by Ms Vivien, food was delicous.. Very good energy at the place!! Thank you guys, hope to see you soon

Title: Decent
Review: The waitress and waiters here is bad and very rude. The cocktails was decent. We wanted a table but the said we have to stand I'm the bar.

Title: "Hard Rock Cafe"
Review: Good place to visit! good american food and lots of upbeat music and people! On broadway so lively place and famous too!

Title: Drinks
Review: We went to Hard Rock Cafe for some drinks! Waiter was really good! There was lots of displays which was interesting!

Title: Fantastic service
Review: Our visit to the Hard rock cafe in New York, is probably the best visit that we have expirenced ever. The host was great, the food tasted amazing:) Louise and Marco Denmark

Title: yes its awesome
Review: Wow service here is top notch. Had great food extra large servings so if theres one thing order only hal as you will be amazed at how big the servings are.

Title: Seated and served quickly.
Review: Waiter was very good and made sure all was satisfactory. We ordered a club sandwich and ribs. Enjoyed it.

Title: Amazing scenery
Review: This place has amazing scenery. The food though was a little bit below expectations. I had ribs and they were overcooked.

Title: Good meal at Hard rock cafe
Review: the food is good and helpings are large at Hard Rock cafe. We go to hard rock cafes of every city that we can and we were not disappointed. Would recommend it highly.

Title: Love it!
Review: Came here July 4th, love the atmosphere. Not too loud at all. Great food and service. ALOT to see. Great rock n roll history here. It's the 2nd time for me here. I come every time.

Title: NYC family trip
Review: The decor and music memorabilia is truly spectacular. The music and atmosphere is very festive. Food is not bad for bar food but wait staff not great. Fun place and nice to see...

Title: Too crowded
Review: What can you expect in the middle of New York. So many people around… The food was ok, hard rock atmosphere and music …

Title: Fantastic
Review: As usuall the first evening in New York we enjoy our dinner at the Hard Rock Cafe. Service and food were great. Thanks again!

Title: Great place for a big group with kids
Review: We had dinner in a big group of 5 adults and 6 children. We all had fun enjoying the food , the music , videos and details of this Restaurant. The location is also great in times square

Title: Hard rock never lets you down!
Review: Gorgeous venue! Really big and spacious, entrance shop & restaurant! Lovely staff, great food as always!

Title: It's Hard rock...
Review: Food and drinks are about the same as in any other Hard Rock. Pretty good, nothing revolutionary. Quite expensive. Staff are friendly and full of energy.

Title: Dreadful
Review: We tried twice to eat here - first time we were told we had to book online, 2nd we were informed they were closing for a private function so we gave up - won't try again.

Title: Good food. Great service.
Review: This is one of the better Hard Rock Cafes. Try the appetizer sampler. It's out of this world and would serve as a lunch for four. Exceptional value for this area.

Title: Fantastic Cocktails, Great Atmosphere!
Review: Popped in here for cocktails, they were very pricey but a great atmosphere and the staff were lovely. Service was very quick and the cocktails were lovely.

Title: Go to 'Ellen's Stardust Diner' instead...
Review: Decor is nice and service is good but that's it. Food was below average and shouldn't be this bad considering the prices. Go to Ellen's instead...much better in my opinion.

Title: Good atmoshere
Review: Good food good at,osphere with live bands Don't have to wait can go to the bar tables and get served straight away. Food is reasonably priced with attentive staff .

Title: Awesome
Review: We loved it there! We got souvenir s and some great drinks ! My son got a virgin daiquiri and we got the glass to take home!

Title: Love Hard Rock Cafe
Review: My wife and l like to view hard rock cafes at every place we travel. We have been to 17 different ones. It was awesome always an enjoyment.

Title: Amazing!
Review: The food was very good with great entertainment. It's very popular for parties. You have to book in advance a table.

Title: Drinks
Review: Great location for meeting people in the middle of city. Not a quiet setting, but great for having a few drinks

Title: Sat Night in Time Square!!
Review: Great spot, Excellent Service, Cheap Beer and the BEST Nachos's going!! Great to get out of the busy streets!! offered Gluten Free as well!!

Title: Consistently Good Food
Review: We have come here many times and enjoy it. It has a good atmosphere and right in the center of Times Square. The food will not disappoint. The restaurant is clean and comfortable. The wait staff has always been good, never had any issues.

Title: Top Service
Review: As its Hard Rock you have to visit! Service is brilliant as are most places in NYC but make sure you tip! Food was great and the whole interior looked, felt nice!

Title: Nothing but fun!!!
Review: Food and drinks were wonderful. Our waitress was the best. We had such a great conversation with her. She gave us great advice on places to visit and how to get there. Highly recommended visiting.

Title: Good place to visit
Review: Love this place!! The food is absolutely wonderful and the staff is perfectly crazy))) will recommend this place for all of my friends

Title: Hard rock cafe
Review: This is a beautiful Place , the food is excellent and the atmosphere is Cool too. I suggest this restaurant, is so cool( full of important Guitars)

Title: Fun place for Tourists
Review: Love to go to the different Hard Rock's around the country. They all have different stuff in them. The food is ok, the service is also ok, depending on when you go, it's pretty busy. I like going and will go back soon!

Title: Tourist trap
Review: Noisy place in basement, cocktails just sugar and ice, almost no alcohol. Friendly service though. Seems popular due to name and location but it feels like a rip-off...

Title: Great Atmosphere
Review: I have visited a number of HRC across the world and this one was one of the best. Usual good food and selection of drinks and a massive collection of significant memorabilia.

Title: High;y Recommended
Review: The service, The food, the atmosphere were all fab. Will happily come back again and recommend to others happily.

Title: why ?
Review: If you travel all the way to NYC, don't go to a lame restaurant you can visit anywhere. So many better restaurant options in NYC.

Title: Hard rock cafe new york
Review: Excellent food reasonable prices and good serving staff , great atmospere with some good memerabelia

Title: I hate the food 🤢
Review: The food is terrible not that good of space and horrible service not a good place for family only go there if your goth😂

Title: Great
Review: We went after going to a show. We got appetizers and drinks. Both were very good. we sat at the bar and the service was very good.

Title: Hard Rock Cafe times square
Review: Went there with family on a very busy Easter Sunday. Had to wait around 20mins for a table but it was well worth the wait. Food was excellent, cocktails were great and atmosphere fantastic. Waiters, especially Brian, were excellent.

Title: Cool Stuff. Good Food and Service
Review: Very cool to see the CBGB wall in the display case. The food was good. The staff was friendly. Very entertaining meal.

Title: Laid back evening at The Hard Rock
Review: Beers and natchos. You can't beat it! Easy laid back vibe and great service. Sitting at the bar and meeting new people from all around the world. Great night out!

Title: Ms
Review: Food is good and service as well.The drinks were tasty.Would like to see more variety in the gift shop.I do go to Hard Rock in any city I'm in where there is a Hard Rock.

Title: Great service and friendly service
Review: This Hard Rock Café is a must see if you are visiting New York. The food is great and the service is always fast and friendly. While you are waiting you can listen to good music and check out the memorabilia.

Title: About the hard Rock Cafe
Review: The hard Rock Cafe is a must place to go for visitors coming to New .York.city for the first time the food there is well prepared to customer satisfaction and the in side is decoratrf

Title: FUN, FUN, FUN
Review: We tried to visit two other restaurants before settling on the Hard Rock and so glad we did. Hakiem waited on us and was such a pleasure to meet and talk with. We had a great time and left with stories and pictures.

Title: Great Atmosphere
Review: Well worth the visit. The memorabilia on show is worth seeing alone and for music fans this is a must visit. We had burger meals which were good albeit a bit more expensive than your average burger restaurant but worth it for the venue.

Title: Fun Atmosphere
Review: We eat here just about every time we visit New York City and need a comfort food fix. Love the nachos, buffalo wings, burgers and strawberry basil lemonade! And for desert, the fudge brownie ice cream Sunday is a must!

Title: Good food, good music, good service!
Review: You usually can't go wrong going to a hard rock cafe. You know the selection of food they have is decent no matter which one you go to. Always good music playing, good service, and lots of memorabilia to enjoy.

Title: Great place to visit when in New York
Review: Visited during New York trip. Tasty food, especially the burgers, great service and superb location. Lots of memorabilia for fans to look at. Worth a visit.

Title: Quick lunch
Review: Really quick and friendly service, we had the Texan pulled pork burger. It was very tasty! Because it's so good and famous, you have to plan the wait!

Title: Vacation
Review: Always love coming to hard rocks, the staff is always outgoing the food was good, can never go wrong with mac and cheese. Love the NYC hard rock the memorabilia is amazing

Title: Coming back to HRC on Broadway
Review: Ideally located in downtown Manhattan with the typical food and other stuff that you usually except at HRC.

Title: Great Hard Rock experience
Review: Good service. Good atmosphere. Yummy food. Hasn't quite got the quirkiness of some other Hard Rock Cafes. We went mid-afternoon - no queues!!

Title: Good place for a beer
Review: The atmosphere of this place is amazing with all the memorabilia from rock bands. The bar is very nice and wings are great

Title: Continuing with tradition
Review: My husband and I always have at least one Hard Rock Cafe meal whilst travelling overseas. Times Square did not disappoint, with meals reasonably priced and value for money.

Title: Food stop
Review: This was the first place we ate in NYC and it didn't disappoint. Good portions were good and the drinks even better. Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Live act going on in the back ground too.

Title: Fabulous
Review: Came here once we unpacked, just what we needed after the flight! Staff really friendly too! Amazing!

Title: OK ish
Review: Food average not too bad the table service is ok but ain't amazing as thought might be but they are usually busy due to the brand n location. Good to grab some merchandise but if you ain't hungry your not missing out on much.

Title: Great place
Review: Excellent place to enjoy good music and food...I hope to come back soon...the burgers are amazing and brownie with ice cream should be always the dessert

Title: Fun picture of our group before eating.
Review: Always fun atmosphere when dining at a Hard Rock Cafe. Food was good and service was good. Love the music and videos playing all over the restaurant.

Title: New York baby
Review: After visiting time square 👍Had too take in hard rock aswell just for atmosphere & great meal Waitress coudnt do enough for us & id highly recommend visiting here

Title: hard rock quality
Review: service was very good as expected from a hard rock cafe staff very friendly and helpful food cooked to order this time the music was not to loud so you could still have conversation with your dinner company

Title: Awesome
Review: As a teen fron the 60's...this place rocks....the music is loud, the atmosphere is giddy and the memorabelia outstanding. Food was good...wai staff helpful...fun, fun place to visit

Title: quality as expected for a Hard Rock Cafe
Review: Probably one of the biggest Hard Rock Cafe's I've visited around the world. Very busy and seemed extremely popular. Service was very good. Food was the usual standards, nothing special.

Title: Very American dining experience
Review: The place itself was fantastic. Crazy music memorabilia on display (Jim Morrison, Jimi Hendrix, U2, The Beatles etc). The merchandise was priced reasonably. The food was tasty but very fatty. Emphasis on tasty though. Fine service. Would do again.

Title: Not worth it
Review: Expensive, average food with super slow service. Noisy restaurant with nice music memorabilia. I recommend the restaurant if you have a Hard Rock glass collection with major cities visited or are looking for average food with expensive drinks. Fun but better food at other places.

Title: Very good meal with a good beer.
Review: The restaurant is very well located at Times Square - Broadway. Very good food and drinks. The staff is very well trained. We spent very good time there with nice music and fun.

Title: Love it
Review: Absolutely love this place. The cocktails are amazing. The food is great. The staff are friendly and always happy to be there. The music always keeps you singing!

Title: First meal in our New York bisit
Review: We had a fully lovely evening from entry to staff service the food the atmosphere and overall good. Only down side is a bit pricey

Title: Best Cosmopolitan I have ever had
Review: Food very tasty, service excellent, background music made for a very pleasant evening with friends. We were able to shop upstairs for suveniers. Not the cheapest night with the cocktails but they were good.

Title: Hard rock is hard rock
Review: Expensive, no great food, a lot of noise, typical hard rock cafe but here in NY nothing special! I really can't say more

Title: Great food
Review: The decor and atmosphere matched the food for me. The waitress was brilliant, very happy and helpful. We wanted to kill a few hours so took our time between courses and this didn't pose any problems. Great food, not posh though.

Title: Very overpriced average food!
Review: This place is by far more a tourist attraction than a restaurant. Over priced average quality food, so many better places to eat in New York. I would recommend people avoid this place for food and just go for the pictures.

Title: Brilliant
Review: This place was amazing the food perfect the staff was freindly and couldn't do anymore to help. Also good to look at all the cool things there.the shop had good merchandise at good prices will be going back

Title: Excellent meal
Review: Excellent visit to Hard Rock Cafe with very good food, great service and surroundings as expected. Fajitas were excellent as were the burgers and steak. Well worth a visit!!

Title: Good place to take the family for lunch when visiting
Review: Good place to take the family for lunch when visiting. Kids (of all ages) enjoy the R&R memorabilia. The service is good so you can get back to afternoon activities soon, after a nice break with good food.

Title: Friendly staff
Review: The big screen videos are awesome. The staff is very friendly and helpful on tips in the big city. The food was great as well as the drinks. Very nice bar area.

Title: Excellent ambiance and delicious food
Review: Loved this hotel. Huge variety of cuisine. Good food and drinks. Loved the picture taken with guitar. Thanks guys... This restaurant is located in famous Times Square of New York City.

Title: Service good; food not so much
Review: Food was not very appealing. I think it's just tired. They need a re-do. Call Gordon Ramsey. ;) Our server was very friendly and professional. I enjoyed the old videos while eating.

Title: Rip off!
Review: So expensive for what you get!! 11dollars for a glass of house white. 21dollars for a burger 🍔 it's the name your paying for. The one good thing was the staff who were very friendly.

Title: Usual syandard
Review: Have eaten in many restaurants around the world and found this restaurant matched standard and service. The waitress was very attentive and the food was of decent standard. If I was in the area I would revisit.

Title: Worth a trip
Review: Thought the service was very good, food was great, didn't have to wait long for our food, was always asked if they could get us anything, worth the money
We found the hard rock café and decided to go and have breakfast. Food was not the best, but a good place to go and look a the memorabilia and have a drink.

Title: Hard rock review
Review: Food was good, atmosphere was good. Not too long a wait ( it was superbowl Sunday though and they were not showing the game ) For the money, the food was good, service too was good. Would recommend for a bite to eat.

Title: Always a Rocking Time!
Review: As all the Hard Rock Cafe restaurants the experience is great, the service was top quality with the servers knowledge of the menu outstanding. Always hard not to purchase something from the shop on the way out....

Title: The food was great.
Review: Nice place if you are a music or rock lover, even if you only are a food lover. I tasted a New York and it was great.

Title: Great place
